00124 static void qsort_trans_data(TransInfo *t, TransData *head, TransData *tail, TransData *temp)
00125 {
00126     TransData *ihead = head;
00127     TransData *itail = tail;
00128     *temp = *head;
00129 
00130     while (head < tail)
00131     {
00132         if (t->flag & T_PROP_CONNECTED) {
00133             while ((tail->dist >= temp->dist) && (head < tail))
00134                 tail--;
00135         }
00136         else {
00137             while ((tail->rdist >= temp->rdist) && (head < tail))
00138                 tail--;
00139         }
00140 
00141         if (head != tail)
00142         {
00143             *head = *tail;
00144             head++;
00145         }
00146 
00147         if (t->flag & T_PROP_CONNECTED) {
00148             while ((head->dist <= temp->dist) && (head < tail))
00149                 head++;
00150         }
00151         else {
00152             while ((head->rdist <= temp->rdist) && (head < tail))
00153                 head++;
00154         }
00155 
00156         if (head != tail)
00157         {
00158             *tail = *head;
00159             tail--;
00160         }
00161     }
00162 
00163     *head = *temp;
00164     if (ihead < head) {
00165         qsort_trans_data(t, ihead, head-1, temp);
00166     }
00167     if (itail > head) {
00168         qsort_trans_data(t, head+1, itail, temp);
00169     }
00170 }
00171 
00172 void sort_trans_data_dist(TransInfo *t)
00173 {
00174     TransData temp;
00175     TransData *start = t->data;
00176     int i = 1;
00177 
00178     while (i < t->total && start->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
00179         start++;
00180         i++;
00181     }
00182     qsort_trans_data(t, start, t->data + t->total - 1, &temp);
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void sort_trans_data(TransInfo *t)
00186 {
00187     TransData *sel, *unsel;
00188     TransData temp;
00189     unsel = t->data;
00190     sel = t->data;
00191     sel += t->total - 1;
00192     while (sel > unsel) {
00193         while (unsel->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
00194             unsel++;
00195             if (unsel == sel) {
00196                 return;
00197             }
00198         }
00199         while (!(sel->flag & TD_SELECTED)) {
00200             sel--;
00201             if (unsel == sel) {
00202                 return;
00203             }
00204         }
00205         temp = *unsel;
00206         *unsel = *sel;
00207         *sel = temp;
00208         sel--;
00209         unsel++;
00210     }
00211 }

00213 /* distance calculated from not-selected vertex to nearest selected vertex
00214  * warning; this is loops inside loop, has minor N^2 issues, but by sorting list it is OK */
00215 static void set_prop_dist(TransInfo *t, short with_dist)
00216 {
00217     TransData *tob;
00218     int a;
00219 
00220     for (a=0, tob= t->data; a<t->total; a++, tob++) {
00221 
00222         tob->rdist= 0.0f; // init, it was mallocced
00223 
00224         if ((tob->flag & TD_SELECTED)==0) {
00225             TransData *td;
00226             int i;
00227             float dist, vec[3];
00228 
00229             tob->rdist = -1.0f; // signal for next loop
00230 
00231             for (i = 0, td= t->data; i < t->total; i++, td++) {
00232                 if (td->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
00233                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, tob->center, td->center);
00234                     mul_m3_v3(tob->mtx, vec);
00235                     dist = normalize_v3(vec);
00236                     if (tob->rdist == -1.0f) {
00237                         tob->rdist = dist;
00238                     }
00239                     else if (dist < tob->rdist) {
00240                         tob->rdist = dist;
00241                     }
00242                 }
00243                 else break; // by definition transdata has selected items in beginning
00244             }
00245             if (with_dist) {
00246                 tob->dist = tob->rdist;
00247             }
00248         }
00249     }
00250 }

00254 /* ********************* texture space ********* */
00255 
00256 static void createTransTexspace(TransInfo *t)
00257 {
00258     Scene *scene = t->scene;
00259     TransData *td;
00260     Object *ob;
00261     ID *id;
00262     short *texflag;
00263 
00264     ob = OBACT;
00265 
00266     if (ob == NULL) { // Shouldn't logically happen, but still...
00267         t->total = 0;
00268         return;
00269     }
00270 
00271     id = ob->data;
00272     if (id == NULL || !ELEM3( GS(id->name), ID_ME, ID_CU, ID_MB )) {
00273         t->total = 0;
00274         return;
00275     }
00276 
00277     t->total = 1;
00278     td= t->data= MEM_callocN(sizeof(TransData), "TransTexspace");
00279     td->ext= t->ext= MEM_callocN(sizeof(TransDataExtension), "TransTexspace");
00280 
00281     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
00282     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ob->obmat[3]);
00283     td->ob = ob;
00284 
00285     copy_m3_m4(td->mtx, ob->obmat);
00286     copy_m3_m4(td->axismtx, ob->obmat);
00287     normalize_m3(td->axismtx);
00288     invert_m3_m3(td->smtx, td->mtx);
00289 
00290     if (give_obdata_texspace(ob, &texflag, &td->loc, &td->ext->size, &td->ext->rot)) {
00291         ob->dtx |= OB_TEXSPACE;
00292         *texflag &= ~ME_AUTOSPACE;
00293     }
00294 
00295     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
00296     copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irot, td->ext->rot);
00297     copy_v3_v3(td->ext->isize, td->ext->size);
00298 }

00302 static void createTransEdge(TransInfo *t)
00303 {
00304     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(t->obedit);
00305     TransData *td = NULL;
00306     BMEdge *eed;
00307     BMIter iter;
00308     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3];
00309     int count=0, countsel=0;
00310     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
00311 
00312     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00313         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00314             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) countsel++;
00315             if (propmode) count++;
00316         }
00317     }
00318 
00319     if (countsel == 0)
00320         return;
00321 
00322     if (propmode) {
00323         t->total = count;
00324     }
00325     else {
00326         t->total = countsel;
00327     }
00328 
00329     td= t->data= MEM_callocN(t->total * sizeof(TransData), "TransCrease");
00330 
00331     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
00332     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
00333 
00334     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00335         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) || propmode)) { 
00336             float *bweight = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00337             float *crease = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00338             
00339             /* need to set center for center calculations */
00340             add_v3_v3v3(td->center, eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
00341             mul_v3_fl(td->center, 0.5f);
00342 
00343             td->loc= NULL;
00344             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
00345                 td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
00346             else
00347                 td->flag= 0;
00348 
00349 
00350             copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
00351             copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
00352 
00353             td->ext = NULL;
00354             if (t->mode == TFM_BWEIGHT) {
00355                 td->val = bweight;
00356                 td->ival = bweight ? *bweight : 1.0f;
00357             }
00358             else {
00359                 td->val = crease;
00360                 td->ival = crease ? *crease : 0.0f;
00361             }
00362 
00363             td++;
00364         }
00365     }
00366 }

00369 
00370 static bKinematicConstraint *has_targetless_ik(bPoseChannel *pchan)
00371 {
00372     bConstraint *con= pchan->constraints.first;
00373 
00374     for (;con; con= con->next) {
00375         if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC && (con->enforce!=0.0f)) {
00376             bKinematicConstraint *data= con->data;
00377 
00378             if (data->tar==NULL)
00379                 return data;
00380             if (data->tar->type==OB_ARMATURE && data->subtarget[0]==0)
00381                 return data;
00382         }
00383     }
00384     return NULL;
00385 }
00386 
00387 static short apply_targetless_ik(Object *ob)
00388 {
00389     bPoseChannel *pchan, *parchan, *chanlist[256];
00390     bKinematicConstraint *data;
00391     int segcount, apply= 0;
00392 
00393     /* now we got a difficult situation... we have to find the
00394      * target-less IK pchans, and apply transformation to the all
00395      * pchans that were in the chain */
00396 
00397     for (pchan=ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
00398         data= has_targetless_ik(pchan);
00399         if (data && (data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO)) {
00400 
00401             /* fill the array with the bones of the chain (armature.c does same, keep it synced) */
00402             segcount= 0;
00403 
00404             /* exclude tip from chain? */
00405             if (!(data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TIP))
00406                 parchan= pchan->parent;
00407             else
00408                 parchan= pchan;
00409 
00410             /* Find the chain's root & count the segments needed */
00411             for (; parchan; parchan=parchan->parent) {
00412                 chanlist[segcount]= parchan;
00413                 segcount++;
00414 
00415                 if (segcount==data->rootbone || segcount>255) break; // 255 is weak
00416             }
00417             for (;segcount;segcount--) {
00418                 Bone *bone;
00419                 float rmat[4][4]/*, tmat[4][4], imat[4][4]*/;
00420 
00421                 /* pose_mat(b) = pose_mat(b-1) * offs_bone * channel * constraint * IK  */
00422                 /* we put in channel the entire result of rmat= (channel * constraint * IK) */
00423                 /* pose_mat(b) = pose_mat(b-1) * offs_bone * rmat  */
00424                 /* rmat = pose_mat(b) * inv( pose_mat(b-1) * offs_bone ) */
00425 
00426                 parchan= chanlist[segcount-1];
00427                 bone= parchan->bone;
00428                 bone->flag |= BONE_TRANSFORM;   /* ensures it gets an auto key inserted */
00429 
00430     /* XXX Old code. Will remove it later. */
00431 #if 0
00432                 if (parchan->parent) {
00433                     Bone *parbone= parchan->parent->bone;
00434                     float offs_bone[4][4];
00435 
00436                     /* offs_bone =  yoffs(b-1) + root(b) + bonemat(b) */
00437                     copy_m4_m3(offs_bone, bone->bone_mat);
00438 
00439                     /* The bone's root offset (is in the parent's coordinate system) */
00440                     copy_v3_v3(offs_bone[3], bone->head);
00441 
00442                     /* Get the length translation of parent (length along y axis) */
00443                     offs_bone[3][1]+= parbone->length;
00444 
00445                     /* pose_mat(b-1) * offs_bone */
00446                     if (parchan->bone->flag & BONE_HINGE) {
00447                         /* the rotation of the parent restposition */
00448                         copy_m4_m4(rmat, parbone->arm_mat); /* rmat used as temp */
00449 
00450                         /* the location of actual parent transform */
00451                         copy_v3_v3(rmat[3], offs_bone[3]);
00452                         offs_bone[3][0]= offs_bone[3][1]= offs_bone[3][2]= 0.0f;
00453                         mul_m4_v3(parchan->parent->pose_mat, rmat[3]);
00454 
00455                         mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, rmat, offs_bone);
00456                     }
00457                     else if (parchan->bone->flag & BONE_NO_SCALE) {
00458                         mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, parchan->parent->pose_mat, offs_bone);
00459                         normalize_m4(tmat);
00460                     }
00461                     else
00462                         mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, parchan->parent->pose_mat, offs_bone);
00463 
00464                     invert_m4_m4(imat, tmat);
00465                 }
00466                 else {
00467                     copy_m4_m3(tmat, bone->bone_mat);
00468 
00469                     copy_v3_v3(tmat[3], bone->head);
00470                     invert_m4_m4(imat, tmat);
00471                 }
00472                 /* result matrix */
00473                 mult_m4_m4m4(rmat, imat, parchan->pose_mat);
00474 #endif
00475                 armature_mat_pose_to_bone(parchan, parchan->pose_mat, rmat);
00476 
00477                 /* apply and decompose, doesn't work for constraints or non-uniform scale well */
00478                 {
00479                     float rmat3[3][3], qrmat[3][3], imat3[3][3], smat[3][3];
00480                     
00481                     copy_m3_m4(rmat3, rmat);
00482                     
00483                     /* rotation */
00484                         /* [#22409] is partially caused by this, as slight numeric error introduced during 
00485                          * the solving process leads to locked-axis values changing. However, we cannot modify
00486                          * the values here, or else there are huge discreptancies between IK-solver (interactive)
00487                          * and applied poses.
00488                          */
00489                     if (parchan->rotmode > 0)
00490                         mat3_to_eulO(parchan->eul, parchan->rotmode,rmat3);
00491                     else if (parchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE)
00492                         mat3_to_axis_angle(parchan->rotAxis, &parchan->rotAngle,rmat3);
00493                     else
00494                         mat3_to_quat(parchan->quat,rmat3);
00495                     
00496                     /* for size, remove rotation */
00497                     /* causes problems with some constraints (so apply only if needed) */
00498                     if (data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_STRETCH) {
00499                         if (parchan->rotmode > 0)
00500                             eulO_to_mat3( qrmat,parchan->eul, parchan->rotmode);
00501                         else if (parchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE)
00502                             axis_angle_to_mat3( qrmat,parchan->rotAxis, parchan->rotAngle);
00503                         else
00504                             quat_to_mat3( qrmat,parchan->quat);
00505                         
00506                         invert_m3_m3(imat3, qrmat);
00507                         mul_m3_m3m3(smat, rmat3, imat3);
00508                         mat3_to_size( parchan->size,smat);
00509                     }
00510                     
00511                     /* causes problems with some constraints (e.g. childof), so disable this */
00512                     /* as it is IK shouldn't affect location directly */
00513                     /* copy_v3_v3(parchan->loc, rmat[3]); */
00514                 }
00515 
00516             }
00517 
00518             apply= 1;
00519             data->flag &= ~CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO;
00520         }
00521     }
00522 
00523     return apply;
00524 }
00525 
00526 static void add_pose_transdata(TransInfo *t, bPoseChannel *pchan, Object *ob, TransData *td)
00527 {
00528     Bone *bone= pchan->bone;
00529     float pmat[3][3], omat[3][3];
00530     float cmat[3][3], tmat[3][3];
00531     float vec[3];
00532 
00533     copy_v3_v3(vec, pchan->pose_mat[3]);
00534     copy_v3_v3(td->center, vec);
00535 
00536     td->ob = ob;
00537     td->flag = TD_SELECTED;
00538     if (bone->flag & BONE_HINGE_CHILD_TRANSFORM)
00539     {
00540         td->flag |= TD_NOCENTER;
00541     }
00542 
00543     if (bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM_CHILD)
00544     {
00545         td->flag |= TD_NOCENTER;
00546         td->flag |= TD_NO_LOC;
00547     }
00548 
00549     td->protectflag= pchan->protectflag;
00550 
00551     td->loc = pchan->loc;
00552     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, pchan->loc);
00553 
00554     td->ext->size= pchan->size;
00555     copy_v3_v3(td->ext->isize, pchan->size);
00556 
00557     if (pchan->rotmode > 0) {
00558         td->ext->rot= pchan->eul;
00559         td->ext->rotAxis= NULL;
00560         td->ext->rotAngle= NULL;
00561         td->ext->quat= NULL;
00562         
00563         copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irot, pchan->eul);
00564     }
00565     else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00566         td->ext->rot= NULL;
00567         td->ext->rotAxis= pchan->rotAxis;
00568         td->ext->rotAngle= &pchan->rotAngle;
00569         td->ext->quat= NULL;
00570         
00571         td->ext->irotAngle= pchan->rotAngle;
00572         copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irotAxis, pchan->rotAxis);
00573     }
00574     else {
00575         td->ext->rot= NULL;
00576         td->ext->rotAxis= NULL;
00577         td->ext->rotAngle= NULL;
00578         td->ext->quat= pchan->quat;
00579         
00580         copy_qt_qt(td->ext->iquat, pchan->quat);
00581     }
00582     td->ext->rotOrder= pchan->rotmode;
00583 
00584 
00585     /* proper way to get parent transform + own transform + constraints transform */
00586     copy_m3_m4(omat, ob->obmat);
00587 
00588     /* New code, using "generic" pchan_to_pose_mat(). */
00589     {
00590         float rotscale_mat[4][4], loc_mat[4][4];
00591 
00592         pchan_to_pose_mat(pchan, rotscale_mat, loc_mat);
00593         if (t->mode == TFM_TRANSLATION)
00594             copy_m3_m4(pmat, loc_mat);
00595         else
00596             copy_m3_m4(pmat, rotscale_mat);
00597 
00598         if (constraints_list_needinv(t, &pchan->constraints)) {
00599             copy_m3_m4(tmat, pchan->constinv);
00600             invert_m3_m3(cmat, tmat);
00601             mul_serie_m3(td->mtx, pmat, omat, cmat, NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00602         }
00603         else
00604             mul_serie_m3(td->mtx, pmat, omat, NULL, NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00605     }
00606 
00607     /* XXX Old code. Will remove it later. */
00608 #if 0
00609     if (ELEM(t->mode, TFM_TRANSLATION, TFM_RESIZE) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_NO_LOCAL_LOCATION))
00610         unit_m3(bmat);
00611     else
00612         copy_m3_m3(bmat, pchan->bone->bone_mat);
00613 
00614     if (pchan->parent) {
00615         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_HINGE) {
00616             copy_m3_m4(pmat, pchan->parent->bone->arm_mat);
00617             if (!(pchan->bone->flag & BONE_NO_SCALE)) {
00618                 float tsize[3], tsmat[3][3];
00619                 mat4_to_size(tsize, pchan->parent->pose_mat);
00620                 size_to_mat3(tsmat, tsize);
00621                 mul_m3_m3m3(pmat, tsmat, pmat);
00622             }
00623         }
00624         else {
00625             copy_m3_m4(pmat, pchan->parent->pose_mat);
00626             if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_NO_SCALE)
00627                 normalize_m3(pmat);
00628         }
00629 
00630         if (constraints_list_needinv(t, &pchan->constraints)) {
00631             copy_m3_m4(tmat, pchan->constinv);
00632             invert_m3_m3(cmat, tmat);
00633             mul_serie_m3(td->mtx, bmat, pmat, omat, cmat, NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00634         }
00635         else
00636             mul_serie_m3(td->mtx, bmat, pmat, omat, NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00637     }
00638     else {
00639         if (constraints_list_needinv(t, &pchan->constraints)) {
00640             copy_m3_m4(tmat, pchan->constinv);
00641             invert_m3_m3(cmat, tmat);
00642             mul_serie_m3(td->mtx, bmat, omat, cmat, NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00643         }
00644         else
00645             mul_m3_m3m3(td->mtx, omat, bmat);
00646     }
00647 # endif
00648 
00649     invert_m3_m3(td->smtx, td->mtx);
00650 
00651     /* exceptional case: rotate the pose bone which also applies transformation
00652      * when a parentless bone has BONE_NO_LOCAL_LOCATION [] */
00653     if (!ELEM(t->mode, TFM_TRANSLATION, TFM_RESIZE) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_NO_LOCAL_LOCATION)) {
00654         if (pchan->parent) {
00655             /* same as td->smtx but without pchan->bone->bone_mat */
00656             td->flag |= TD_PBONE_LOCAL_MTX_C;
00657             mul_m3_m3m3(td->ext->l_smtx, pchan->bone->bone_mat, td->smtx);
00658         }
00659         else {
00660             td->flag |= TD_PBONE_LOCAL_MTX_P;
00661         }
00662     }
00663     
00664     /* for axismat we use bone's own transform */
00665     copy_m3_m4(pmat, pchan->pose_mat);
00666     mul_m3_m3m3(td->axismtx, omat, pmat);
00667     normalize_m3(td->axismtx);
00668 
00669     if (t->mode==TFM_BONESIZE) {
00670         bArmature *arm= t->poseobj->data;
00671 
00672         if (arm->drawtype==ARM_ENVELOPE) {
00673             td->loc= NULL;
00674             td->val= &bone->dist;
00675             td->ival= bone->dist;
00676         }
00677         else {
00678             // abusive storage of scale in the loc pointer :)
00679             td->loc= &bone->xwidth;
00680             copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
00681             td->val= NULL;
00682         }
00683     }
00684 
00685     /* in this case we can do target-less IK grabbing */
00686     if (t->mode==TFM_TRANSLATION) {
00687         bKinematicConstraint *data= has_targetless_ik(pchan);
00688         if (data) {
00689             if (data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TIP) {
00690                 copy_v3_v3(data->grabtarget, pchan->pose_tail);
00691             }
00692             else {
00693                 copy_v3_v3(data->grabtarget, pchan->pose_head);
00694             }
00695             td->loc = data->grabtarget;
00696             copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
00697             data->flag |= CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO;
00698 
00699             /* only object matrix correction */
00700             copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, omat);
00701             invert_m3_m3(td->smtx, td->mtx);
00702         }
00703     }
00704 
00705     /* store reference to first constraint */
00706     td->con= pchan->constraints.first;
00707 }
00708 
00709 static void bone_children_clear_transflag(int mode, short around, ListBase *lb)
00710 {
00711     Bone *bone= lb->first;
00712 
00713     for (;bone;bone= bone->next) {
00714         if ((bone->flag & BONE_HINGE) && (bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00715         {
00716             bone->flag |= BONE_HINGE_CHILD_TRANSFORM;
00717         }
00718         else if ((bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) &&
00719                  (mode == TFM_ROTATION || mode == TFM_TRACKBALL) &&
00720                  (around == V3D_LOCAL))
00721         {
00722             bone->flag |= BONE_TRANSFORM_CHILD;
00723         }
00724         else {
00725             bone->flag &= ~BONE_TRANSFORM;
00726         }
00727 
00728         bone_children_clear_transflag(mode, around, &bone->childbase);
00729     }
00730 }
00731 
00732 /* sets transform flags in the bones
00733  * returns total number of bones with BONE_TRANSFORM */
00734 int count_set_pose_transflags(int *out_mode, short around, Object *ob)
00735 {
00736     bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00737     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00738     Bone *bone;
00739     int mode = *out_mode;
00740     int hastranslation = 0;
00741     int total = 0;
00742 
00743     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00744         bone = pchan->bone;
00745         if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, bone)) {
00746             if ((bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED))
00747                 bone->flag |= BONE_TRANSFORM;
00748             else
00749                 bone->flag &= ~BONE_TRANSFORM;
00750             
00751             bone->flag &= ~BONE_HINGE_CHILD_TRANSFORM;
00752             bone->flag &= ~BONE_TRANSFORM_CHILD;
00753         }
00754         else
00755             bone->flag &= ~BONE_TRANSFORM;
00756     }
00757 
00758     /* make sure no bone can be transformed when a parent is transformed */
00759     /* since pchans are depsgraph sorted, the parents are in beginning of list */
00760     if (mode != TFM_BONESIZE) {
00761         for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00762             bone = pchan->bone;
00763             if (bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM)
00764                 bone_children_clear_transflag(mode, around, &bone->childbase);
00765         }
00766     }
00767     /* now count, and check if we have autoIK or have to switch from translate to rotate */
00768     hastranslation = 0;
00769 
00770     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00771         bone = pchan->bone;
00772         if (bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
00773             total++;
00774             
00775             if (mode == TFM_TRANSLATION) {
00776                 if ( has_targetless_ik(pchan)==NULL ) {
00777                     if (pchan->parent && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)) {
00778                         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_HINGE_CHILD_TRANSFORM)
00779                             hastranslation = 1;
00780                     }
00781                     else if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOC)!=OB_LOCK_LOC)
00782                         hastranslation = 1;
00783                 }
00784                 else
00785                     hastranslation = 1;
00786             }
00787         }
00788     }
00789 
00790     /* if there are no translatable bones, do rotation */
00791     if (mode == TFM_TRANSLATION && !hastranslation)
00792     {
00793         *out_mode = TFM_ROTATION;
00794     }
00795 
00796     return total;
00797 }
00798 
00799 
00800 /* -------- Auto-IK ---------- */
00801 
00802 /* adjust pose-channel's auto-ik chainlen */
00803 static void pchan_autoik_adjust (bPoseChannel *pchan, short chainlen)
00804 {
00805     bConstraint *con;
00806 
00807     /* don't bother to search if no valid constraints */
00808     if ((pchan->constflag & (PCHAN_HAS_IK|PCHAN_HAS_TARGET))==0)
00809         return;
00810 
00811     /* check if pchan has ik-constraint */
00812     for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) {
00813         if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC && (con->enforce!=0.0f)) {
00814             bKinematicConstraint *data= con->data;
00815             
00816             /* only accept if a temporary one (for auto-ik) */
00817             if (data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TEMP) {
00818                 /* chainlen is new chainlen, but is limited by maximum chainlen */
00819                 if ((chainlen==0) || (chainlen > data->max_rootbone))
00820                     data->rootbone= data->max_rootbone;
00821                 else
00822                     data->rootbone= chainlen;
00823             }
00824         }
00825     }
00826 }
00827 
00828 /* change the chain-length of auto-ik */
00829 void transform_autoik_update (TransInfo *t, short mode)
00830 {
00831     short *chainlen= &t->settings->autoik_chainlen;
00832     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00833 
00834     /* mode determines what change to apply to chainlen */
00835     if (mode == 1) {
00836         /* mode=1 is from WHEELMOUSEDOWN... increases len */
00837         (*chainlen)++;
00838     }
00839     else if (mode == -1) {
00840         /* mode==-1 is from WHEELMOUSEUP... decreases len */
00841         if (*chainlen > 0) (*chainlen)--;
00842     }
00843 
00844     /* sanity checks (don't assume t->poseobj is set, or that it is an armature) */
00845     if (ELEM(NULL, t->poseobj, t->poseobj->pose))
00846         return;
00847 
00848     /* apply to all pose-channels */
00849     for (pchan=t->poseobj->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
00850         pchan_autoik_adjust(pchan, *chainlen);
00851     }
00852 }
00853 
00854 /* frees temporal IKs */
00855 static void pose_grab_with_ik_clear(Object *ob)
00856 {
00857     bKinematicConstraint *data;
00858     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00859     bConstraint *con, *next;
00860 
00861     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00862         /* clear all temporary lock flags */
00863         pchan->ikflag &= ~(BONE_IK_NO_XDOF_TEMP|BONE_IK_NO_YDOF_TEMP|BONE_IK_NO_ZDOF_TEMP);
00864         
00865         pchan->constflag &= ~(PCHAN_HAS_IK|PCHAN_HAS_TARGET);
00866         
00867         /* remove all temporary IK-constraints added */
00868         for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= next) {
00869             next= con->next;
00870             if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC) {
00871                 data= con->data;
00872                 if (data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TEMP) {
00873                     BLI_remlink(&pchan->constraints, con);
00874                     MEM_freeN(con->data);
00875                     MEM_freeN(con);
00876                     continue;
00877                 }
00878                 pchan->constflag |= PCHAN_HAS_IK;
00879                 if (data->tar==NULL || (data->tar->type==OB_ARMATURE && data->subtarget[0]==0))
00880                     pchan->constflag |= PCHAN_HAS_TARGET;
00881             }
00882         }
00883     }
00884 }
00885 
00886 /* adds the IK to pchan - returns if added */
00887 static short pose_grab_with_ik_add(bPoseChannel *pchan)
00888 {
00889     bKinematicConstraint *targetless = NULL;
00890     bKinematicConstraint *data;
00891     bConstraint *con;
00892 
00893     /* Sanity check */
00894     if (pchan == NULL)
00895         return 0;
00896 
00897     /* Rule: not if there's already an IK on this channel */
00898     for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) {
00899         if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC) {
00900             data= con->data;
00901             
00902             if (data->tar==NULL || (data->tar->type==OB_ARMATURE && data->subtarget[0]=='\0')) {
00903                 /* make reference to constraint to base things off later (if it's the last targetless constraint encountered) */
00904                 targetless = (bKinematicConstraint *)con->data;
00905                 
00906                 /* but, if this is a targetless IK, we make it auto anyway (for the children loop) */
00907                 if (con->enforce!=0.0f) {
00908                     data->flag |= CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO;
00909                     
00910                     /* if no chain length has been specified, just make things obey standard rotation locks too */
00911                     if (data->rootbone == 0) {
00912                         for (; pchan; pchan=pchan->parent) {
00913                             /* here, we set ik-settings for bone from pchan->protectflag */
00914                             // XXX: careful with quats/axis-angle rotations where we're locking 4d components
00915                             if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_XDOF_TEMP;
00916                             if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_YDOF_TEMP;
00917                             if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_ZDOF_TEMP;
00918                         }
00919                     }
00920                     
00921                     return 0; 
00922                 }
00923             }
00924             
00925             if ((con->flag & CONSTRAINT_DISABLE)==0 && (con->enforce!=0.0f))
00926                 return 0;
00927         }
00928     }
00929 
00930     con = add_pose_constraint(NULL, pchan, "TempConstraint", CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC);
00931     pchan->constflag |= (PCHAN_HAS_IK|PCHAN_HAS_TARGET);    /* for draw, but also for detecting while pose solving */
00932     data= con->data;
00933     if (targetless) { 
00934         /* if exists, use values from last targetless (but disabled) IK-constraint as base */
00935         *data = *targetless;
00936     }
00937     else
00938         data->flag= CONSTRAINT_IK_TIP;
00939     data->flag |= CONSTRAINT_IK_TEMP|CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO;
00940     copy_v3_v3(data->grabtarget, pchan->pose_tail);
00941     data->rootbone= 0; /* watch-it! has to be 0 here, since we're still on the same bone for the first time through the loop [#25885] */
00942     
00943     /* we only include bones that are part of a continual connected chain */
00944     while (pchan) {
00945         /* here, we set ik-settings for bone from pchan->protectflag */
00946         // XXX: careful with quats/axis-angle rotations where we're locking 4d components
00947         if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_XDOF_TEMP;
00948         if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_YDOF_TEMP;
00949         if (pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ) pchan->ikflag |= BONE_IK_NO_ZDOF_TEMP;
00950         
00951         /* now we count this pchan as being included */
00952         data->rootbone++;
00953         
00954         /* continue to parent, but only if we're connected to it */
00955         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)
00956             pchan = pchan->parent;
00957         else
00958             pchan = NULL;
00959     }
00960 
00961     /* make a copy of maximum chain-length */
00962     data->max_rootbone= data->rootbone;
00963 
00964     return 1;
00965 }
00966 
00967 /* bone is a candidate to get IK, but we don't do it if it has children connected */
00968 static short pose_grab_with_ik_children(bPose *pose, Bone *bone)
00969 {
00970     Bone *bonec;
00971     short wentdeeper=0, added=0;
00972 
00973     /* go deeper if children & children are connected */
00974     for (bonec= bone->childbase.first; bonec; bonec= bonec->next) {
00975         if (bonec->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) {
00976             wentdeeper= 1;
00977             added+= pose_grab_with_ik_children(pose, bonec);
00978         }
00979     }
00980     if (wentdeeper==0) {
00981         bPoseChannel *pchan= get_pose_channel(pose, bone->name);
00982         if (pchan)
00983             added+= pose_grab_with_ik_add(pchan);
00984     }
00985 
00986     return added;
00987 }
00988 
00989 /* main call which adds temporal IK chains */
00990 static short pose_grab_with_ik(Object *ob)
00991 {
00992     bArmature *arm;
00993     bPoseChannel *pchan, *parent;
00994     Bone *bonec;
00995     short tot_ik= 0;
00996 
00997     if ((ob==NULL) || (ob->pose==NULL) || (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)==0)
00998         return 0;
00999 
01000     arm = ob->data;
01001 
01002     /* Rule: allow multiple Bones (but they must be selected, and only one ik-solver per chain should get added) */
01003     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
01004         if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) {
01005             if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
01006                 /* Rule: no IK for solitatry (unconnected) bones */
01007                 for (bonec=pchan->bone->childbase.first; bonec; bonec=bonec->next) {
01008                     if (bonec->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) {
01009                         break;
01010                     }
01011                 }
01012                 if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)==0 && (bonec == NULL))
01013                     continue;
01014 
01015                 /* rule: if selected Bone is not a root bone, it gets a temporal IK */
01016                 if (pchan->parent) {
01017                     /* only adds if there's no IK yet (and no parent bone was selected) */
01018                     for (parent= pchan->parent; parent; parent= parent->parent) {
01019                         if (parent->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
01020                             break;
01021                     }
01022                     if (parent == NULL)
01023                         tot_ik += pose_grab_with_ik_add(pchan);
01024                 }
01025                 else {
01026                     /* rule: go over the children and add IK to the tips */
01027                     tot_ik += pose_grab_with_ik_children(ob->pose, pchan->bone);
01028                 }
01029             }
01030         }
01031     }
01032 
01033     return (tot_ik) ? 1 : 0;
01034 }
01035 
01036 
01037 /* only called with pose mode active object now */
01038 static void createTransPose(TransInfo *t, Object *ob)
01039 {
01040     bArmature *arm;
01041     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01042     TransData *td;
01043     TransDataExtension *tdx;
01044     short ik_on= 0;
01045     int i;
01046 
01047     t->total= 0;
01048 
01049     /* check validity of state */
01050     arm= get_armature(ob);
01051     if ((arm==NULL) || (ob->pose==NULL)) return;
01052 
01053     if (arm->flag & ARM_RESTPOS) {
01054         if (ELEM(t->mode, TFM_DUMMY, TFM_BONESIZE)==0) {
01055             // XXX use transform operator reports
01056             // BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't select linked when sync selection is enabled");
01057             return;
01058         }
01059     }
01060 
01061     /* do we need to add temporal IK chains? */
01062     if ((arm->flag & ARM_AUTO_IK) && t->mode==TFM_TRANSLATION) {
01063         ik_on= pose_grab_with_ik(ob);
01064         if (ik_on) t->flag |= T_AUTOIK;
01065     }
01066 
01067     /* set flags and count total (warning, can change transform to rotate) */
01068     t->total = count_set_pose_transflags(&t->mode, t->around, ob);
01069 
01070     if (t->total == 0) return;
01071 
01072     t->flag |= T_POSE;
01073     t->poseobj= ob; /* we also allow non-active objects to be transformed, in weightpaint */
01074 
01075     /* init trans data */
01076     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransPoseBone");
01077     tdx = t->ext = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataExtension), "TransPoseBoneExt");
01078     for (i=0; i<t->total; i++, td++, tdx++) {
01079         td->ext= tdx;
01080         td->val = NULL;
01081     }
01082 
01083     /* use pose channels to fill trans data */
01084     td= t->data;
01085     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
01086         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
01087             add_pose_transdata(t, pchan, ob, td);
01088             td++;
01089         }
01090     }
01091 
01092     if (td != (t->data+t->total)) {
01093         // XXX use transform operator reports
01094         // BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_DEBUG, "Bone selection count error");
01095     }
01096 
01097     /* initialize initial auto=ik chainlen's? */
01098     if (ik_on) transform_autoik_update(t, 0);
01099 }
01100 
01101 /* ********************* armature ************** */
01102 
01103 static void createTransArmatureVerts(TransInfo *t)
01104 {
01105     EditBone *ebo;
01106     bArmature *arm= t->obedit->data;
01107     ListBase *edbo = arm->edbo;
01108     TransData *td;
01109     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3], delta[3], bonemat[3][3];
01110     
01111     /* special hack for envelope drawmode and scaling:
01112      *  to allow scaling the size of the envelope around single points,
01113      *  mode should become TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE in this case
01114      */
01115     // TODO: maybe we need a separate hotkey for it, but this is consistent with 2.4x for now
01116     if ((t->mode == TFM_RESIZE) && (arm->drawtype==ARM_ENVELOPE))
01117         t->mode= TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE;
01118     
01119     t->total = 0;
01120     for (ebo = edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next)
01121     {
01122         if (EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, ebo) && !(ebo->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED)) 
01123         {
01124             if (t->mode==TFM_BONESIZE)
01125             {
01126                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
01127                     t->total++;
01128             }
01129             else if (t->mode==TFM_BONE_ROLL) {
01130                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
01131                     t->total++;
01132             }
01133             else {
01134                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)
01135                     t->total++;
01136                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)
01137                     t->total++;
01138             }
01139         }
01140     }
01141 
01142     if (!t->total) return;
01143 
01144     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
01145     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
01146 
01147     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransEditBone");
01148 
01149     for (ebo = edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next)
01150     {
01151         ebo->oldlength = ebo->length;   // length==0.0 on extrude, used for scaling radius of bone points
01152 
01153         if (EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, ebo) && !(ebo->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED)) 
01154         {
01155             if (t->mode==TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE)
01156             {
01157                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)
01158                 {
01159                     td->val= &ebo->rad_head;
01160                     td->ival= *td->val;
01161 
01162                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ebo->head);
01163                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01164 
01165                     copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01166                     copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01167 
01168                     td->loc = NULL;
01169                     td->ext = NULL;
01170                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01171 
01172                     td++;
01173                 }
01174                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)
01175                 {
01176                     td->val= &ebo->rad_tail;
01177                     td->ival= *td->val;
01178                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ebo->tail);
01179                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01180 
01181                     copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01182                     copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01183 
01184                     td->loc = NULL;
01185                     td->ext = NULL;
01186                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01187 
01188                     td++;
01189                 }
01190 
01191             }
01192             else if (t->mode==TFM_BONESIZE) {
01193                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
01194                     if (arm->drawtype==ARM_ENVELOPE)
01195                     {
01196                         td->loc= NULL;
01197                         td->val= &ebo->dist;
01198                         td->ival= ebo->dist;
01199                     }
01200                     else {
01201                         // abusive storage of scale in the loc pointer :)
01202                         td->loc= &ebo->xwidth;
01203                         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
01204                         td->val= NULL;
01205                     }
01206                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ebo->head);
01207                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01208 
01209                     /* use local bone matrix */
01210                     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, ebo->tail, ebo->head);
01211                     vec_roll_to_mat3(delta, ebo->roll, bonemat);
01212                     mul_m3_m3m3(td->mtx, mtx, bonemat);
01213                     invert_m3_m3(td->smtx, td->mtx);
01214 
01215                     copy_m3_m3(td->axismtx, td->mtx);
01216                     normalize_m3(td->axismtx);
01217 
01218                     td->ext = NULL;
01219                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01220 
01221                     td++;
01222                 }
01223             }
01224             else if (t->mode==TFM_BONE_ROLL) {
01225                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
01226                 {
01227                     td->loc= NULL;
01228                     td->val= &(ebo->roll);
01229                     td->ival= ebo->roll;
01230 
01231                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ebo->head);
01232                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01233 
01234                     td->ext = NULL;
01235                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01236 
01237                     td++;
01238                 }
01239             }
01240             else {
01241                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)
01242                 {
01243                     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, ebo->tail);
01244                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, (t->around==V3D_LOCAL) ? ebo->head : td->iloc);
01245                     td->loc= ebo->tail;
01246                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01247                     if (ebo->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED)
01248                         td->protectflag = OB_LOCK_LOC|OB_LOCK_ROT|OB_LOCK_SCALE;
01249 
01250                     copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01251                     copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01252 
01253                     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, ebo->tail, ebo->head);
01254                     vec_roll_to_mat3(delta, ebo->roll, td->axismtx);
01255 
01256                     if ((ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL) == 0)
01257                     {
01258                         td->extra = ebo;
01259                     }
01260 
01261                     td->ext = NULL;
01262                     td->val = NULL;
01263                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01264 
01265                     td++;
01266                 }
01267                 if (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)
01268                 {
01269                     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, ebo->head);
01270                     copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->iloc);
01271                     td->loc= ebo->head;
01272                     td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01273                     if (ebo->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED)
01274                         td->protectflag = OB_LOCK_LOC|OB_LOCK_ROT|OB_LOCK_SCALE;
01275 
01276                     copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01277                     copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01278 
01279                     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, ebo->tail, ebo->head);
01280                     vec_roll_to_mat3(delta, ebo->roll, td->axismtx);
01281 
01282                     td->extra = ebo; /* to fix roll */
01283 
01284                     td->ext = NULL;
01285                     td->val = NULL;
01286                     td->ob = t->obedit;
01287 
01288                     td++;
01289                 }
01290             }
01291         }
01292     }
01293 }
01294 
01295 /* ********************* meta elements ********* */
01296 
01297 static void createTransMBallVerts(TransInfo *t)
01298 {
01299     MetaBall *mb = (MetaBall*)t->obedit->data;
01300     MetaElem *ml;
01301     TransData *td;
01302     TransDataExtension *tx;
01303     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3];
01304     int count=0, countsel=0;
01305     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
01306 
01307     /* count totals */
01308     for (ml= mb->editelems->first; ml; ml= ml->next) {
01309         if (ml->flag & SELECT) countsel++;
01310         if (propmode) count++;
01311     }
01312 
01313     /* note: in prop mode we need at least 1 selected */
01314     if (countsel==0) return;
01315 
01316     if (propmode) t->total = count;
01317     else t->total = countsel;
01318 
01319     td = t->data= MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransObData(MBall EditMode)");
01320     tx = t->ext = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataExtension), "MetaElement_TransExtension");
01321 
01322     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
01323     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
01324 
01325     for (ml= mb->editelems->first; ml; ml= ml->next) {
01326         if (propmode || (ml->flag & SELECT)) {
01327             td->loc= &ml->x;
01328             copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
01329             copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01330 
01331             if (ml->flag & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED | TD_USEQUAT | TD_SINGLESIZE;
01332             else td->flag= TD_USEQUAT;
01333 
01334             copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01335             copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01336 
01337             td->ext = tx;
01338 
01339             /* Radius of MetaElem (mass of MetaElem influence) */
01340             if (ml->flag & MB_SCALE_RAD) {
01341                 td->val = &ml->rad;
01342                 td->ival = ml->rad;
01343             }
01344             else {
01345                 td->val = &ml->s;
01346                 td->ival = ml->s;
01347             }
01348 
01349             /* expx/expy/expz determine "shape" of some MetaElem types */
01350             tx->size = &ml->expx;
01351             tx->isize[0] = ml->expx;
01352             tx->isize[1] = ml->expy;
01353             tx->isize[2] = ml->expz;
01354 
01355             /* quat is used for rotation of MetaElem */
01356             tx->quat = ml->quat;
01357             copy_qt_qt(tx->iquat, ml->quat);
01358 
01359             tx->rot = NULL;
01360 
01361             td++;
01362             tx++;
01363         }
01364     }
01365 }
01366 
01367 /* ********************* curve/surface ********* */
01368 
01369 static void calc_distanceCurveVerts(TransData *head, TransData *tail)
01370 {
01371     TransData *td, *td_near = NULL;
01372     for (td = head; td<=tail; td++) {
01373         if (td->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
01374             td_near = td;
01375             td->dist = 0.0f;
01376         }
01377         else if (td_near) {
01378             float dist;
01379             dist = len_v3v3(td_near->center, td->center);
01380             if (dist < (td-1)->dist) {
01381                 td->dist = (td-1)->dist;
01382             }
01383             else {
01384                 td->dist = dist;
01385             }
01386         }
01387         else {
01388             td->dist = MAXFLOAT;
01389             td->flag |= TD_NOTCONNECTED;
01390         }
01391     }
01392     td_near = NULL;
01393     for (td = tail; td>=head; td--) {
01394         if (td->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
01395             td_near = td;
01396             td->dist = 0.0f;
01397         }
01398         else if (td_near) {
01399             float dist;
01400             dist = len_v3v3(td_near->center, td->center);
01401             if (td->flag & TD_NOTCONNECTED || dist < td->dist || (td+1)->dist < td->dist) {
01402                 td->flag &= ~TD_NOTCONNECTED;
01403                 if (dist < (td+1)->dist) {
01404                     td->dist = (td+1)->dist;
01405                 }
01406                 else {
01407                     td->dist = dist;
01408                 }
01409             }
01410         }
01411     }
01412 }
01413 
01414 /* Utility function for getting the handle data from bezier's */
01415 static TransDataCurveHandleFlags *initTransDataCurveHandles(TransData *td, struct BezTriple *bezt)
01416 {
01417     TransDataCurveHandleFlags *hdata;
01418     td->flag |= TD_BEZTRIPLE;
01419     hdata = td->hdata = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TransDataCurveHandleFlags), "CuHandle Data");
01420     hdata->ih1 = bezt->h1;
01421     hdata->h1 = &bezt->h1;
01422     hdata->ih2 = bezt->h2; /* in case the second is not selected */
01423     hdata->h2 = &bezt->h2;
01424     return hdata;
01425 }
01426 
01427 static void createTransCurveVerts(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
01428 {
01429     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01430     Curve *cu= obedit->data;
01431     TransData *td = NULL;
01432       Nurb *nu;
01433     BezTriple *bezt;
01434     BPoint *bp;
01435     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3];
01436     int a;
01437     int count=0, countsel=0;
01438     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
01439     short hide_handles = (cu->drawflag & CU_HIDE_HANDLES);
01440     ListBase *nurbs;
01441 
01442     /* to be sure */
01443     if (cu->editnurb==NULL) return;
01444 
01445     /* count total of vertices, check identical as in 2nd loop for making transdata! */
01446     nurbs= curve_editnurbs(cu);
01447     for (nu= nurbs->first; nu; nu= nu->next) {
01448         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
01449             for (a=0, bezt= nu->bezt; a<nu->pntsu; a++, bezt++) {
01450                 if (bezt->hide==0) {
01451                     if (hide_handles) {
01452                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) countsel+=3;
01453                         if (propmode) count+= 3;
01454                     }
01455                     else {
01456                         if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) countsel++;
01457                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) countsel++;
01458                         if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) countsel++;
01459                         if (propmode) count+= 3;
01460                     }
01461                 }
01462             }
01463         }
01464         else {
01465             for (a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv, bp= nu->bp; a>0; a--, bp++) {
01466                 if (bp->hide==0) {
01467                     if (propmode) count++;
01468                     if (bp->f1 & SELECT) countsel++;
01469                 }
01470             }
01471         }
01472     }
01473     /* note: in prop mode we need at least 1 selected */
01474     if (countsel==0) return;
01475 
01476     if (propmode) t->total = count;
01477     else t->total = countsel;
01478     t->data= MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransObData(Curve EditMode)");
01479 
01480     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
01481     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
01482 
01483     td = t->data;
01484     for (nu= nurbs->first; nu; nu= nu->next) {
01485         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
01486             TransData *head, *tail;
01487             head = tail = td;
01488             for (a=0, bezt= nu->bezt; a<nu->pntsu; a++, bezt++) {
01489                 if (bezt->hide==0) {
01490                     TransDataCurveHandleFlags *hdata = NULL;
01491 
01492                     if (        propmode ||
01493                             ((bezt->f2 & SELECT) && hide_handles) ||
01494                             ((bezt->f1 & SELECT) && hide_handles == 0)
01495                       ) {
01496                         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, bezt->vec[0]);
01497                         td->loc= bezt->vec[0];
01498                         copy_v3_v3(td->center, bezt->vec[(hide_handles || bezt->f2 & SELECT) ? 1:0]);
01499                         if (hide_handles) {
01500                             if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01501                             else td->flag= 0;
01502                         }
01503                         else {
01504                             if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01505                             else td->flag= 0;
01506                         }
01507                         td->ext = NULL;
01508                         td->val = NULL;
01509 
01510                         hdata = initTransDataCurveHandles(td, bezt);
01511 
01512                         copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01513                         copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01514 
01515                         td++;
01516                         count++;
01517                         tail++;
01518                     }
01519 
01520                     /* This is the Curve Point, the other two are handles */
01521                     if (propmode || (bezt->f2 & SELECT)) {
01522                         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, bezt->vec[1]);
01523                         td->loc= bezt->vec[1];
01524                         copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01525                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01526                         else td->flag= 0;
01527                         td->ext = NULL;
01528 
01529                         if (t->mode==TFM_CURVE_SHRINKFATTEN) { /* || t->mode==TFM_RESIZE) {*/ /* TODO - make points scale */
01530                             td->val = &(bezt->radius);
01531                             td->ival = bezt->radius;
01532                         }
01533                         else if (t->mode==TFM_TILT) {
01534                             td->val = &(bezt->alfa);
01535                             td->ival = bezt->alfa;
01536                         }
01537                         else {
01538                             td->val = NULL;
01539                         }
01540 
01541                         copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01542                         copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01543 
01544                         if ((bezt->f1&SELECT)==0 && (bezt->f3&SELECT)==0)
01545                         /* If the middle is selected but the sides arnt, this is needed */
01546                         if (hdata==NULL) { /* if the handle was not saved by the previous handle */
01547                             hdata = initTransDataCurveHandles(td, bezt);
01548                         }
01549 
01550                         td++;
01551                         count++;
01552                         tail++;
01553                     }
01554                     if (        propmode ||
01555                             ((bezt->f2 & SELECT) && hide_handles) ||
01556                             ((bezt->f3 & SELECT) && hide_handles == 0)
01557                       ) {
01558                         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, bezt->vec[2]);
01559                         td->loc= bezt->vec[2];
01560                         copy_v3_v3(td->center, bezt->vec[(hide_handles || bezt->f2 & SELECT) ? 1:2]);
01561                         if (hide_handles) {
01562                             if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01563                             else td->flag= 0;
01564                         }
01565                         else {
01566                             if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01567                             else td->flag= 0;
01568                         }
01569                         td->ext = NULL;
01570                         td->val = NULL;
01571 
01572                         if (hdata==NULL) { /* if the handle was not saved by the previous handle */
01573                             hdata = initTransDataCurveHandles(td, bezt);
01574                         }
01575 
01576                         copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01577                         copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01578 
01579                         td++;
01580                         count++;
01581                         tail++;
01582                     }
01583                 }
01584                 else if (propmode && head != tail) {
01585                     calc_distanceCurveVerts(head, tail-1);
01586                     head = tail;
01587                 }
01588             }
01589             if (propmode && head != tail)
01590                 calc_distanceCurveVerts(head, tail-1);
01591 
01592             /* TODO - in the case of tilt and radius we can also avoid allocating the initTransDataCurveHandles
01593              * but for now just don't change handle types */
01594             if (ELEM(t->mode, TFM_CURVE_SHRINKFATTEN, TFM_TILT) == 0) {
01595                 /* sets the handles based on their selection, do this after the data is copied to the TransData */
01596                 testhandlesNurb(nu);
01597             }
01598         }
01599         else {
01600             TransData *head, *tail;
01601             head = tail = td;
01602             for (a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv, bp= nu->bp; a>0; a--, bp++) {
01603                 if (bp->hide==0) {
01604                     if (propmode || (bp->f1 & SELECT)) {
01605                         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, bp->vec);
01606                         td->loc= bp->vec;
01607                         copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01608                         if (bp->f1 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01609                         else td->flag= 0;
01610                         td->ext = NULL;
01611 
01612                         if (t->mode==TFM_CURVE_SHRINKFATTEN || t->mode==TFM_RESIZE) {
01613                             td->val = &(bp->radius);
01614                             td->ival = bp->radius;
01615                         }
01616                         else {
01617                             td->val = &(bp->alfa);
01618                             td->ival = bp->alfa;
01619                         }
01620 
01621                         copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01622                         copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01623 
01624                         td++;
01625                         count++;
01626                         tail++;
01627                     }
01628                 }
01629                 else if (propmode && head != tail) {
01630                     calc_distanceCurveVerts(head, tail-1);
01631                     head = tail;
01632                 }
01633             }
01634             if (propmode && head != tail)
01635                 calc_distanceCurveVerts(head, tail-1);
01636         }
01637     }
01638 }
01639 
01640 /* ********************* lattice *************** */
01641 
01642 static void createTransLatticeVerts(TransInfo *t)
01643 {
01644     Lattice *latt = ((Lattice*)t->obedit->data)->editlatt->latt;
01645     TransData *td = NULL;
01646     BPoint *bp;
01647     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3];
01648     int a;
01649     int count=0, countsel=0;
01650     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
01651 
01652     bp = latt->def;
01653     a  = latt->pntsu * latt->pntsv * latt->pntsw;
01654     while (a--) {
01655         if (bp->hide==0) {
01656             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) countsel++;
01657             if (propmode) count++;
01658         }
01659         bp++;
01660     }
01661 
01662      /* note: in prop mode we need at least 1 selected */
01663     if (countsel==0) return;
01664 
01665     if (propmode) t->total = count;
01666     else t->total = countsel;
01667     t->data= MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransObData(Lattice EditMode)");
01668 
01669     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
01670     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
01671 
01672     td = t->data;
01673     bp = latt->def;
01674     a  = latt->pntsu * latt->pntsv * latt->pntsw;
01675     while (a--) {
01676         if (propmode || (bp->f1 & SELECT)) {
01677             if (bp->hide==0) {
01678                 copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, bp->vec);
01679                 td->loc= bp->vec;
01680                 copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01681                 if (bp->f1 & SELECT) td->flag= TD_SELECTED;
01682                 else td->flag= 0;
01683                 copy_m3_m3(td->smtx, smtx);
01684                 copy_m3_m3(td->mtx, mtx);
01685 
01686                 td->ext = NULL;
01687                 td->val = NULL;
01688 
01689                 td++;
01690                 count++;
01691             }
01692         }
01693         bp++;
01694     }
01695 }
01696 
01697 /* ******************* particle edit **************** */
01698 static void createTransParticleVerts(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
01699 {
01700     TransData *td = NULL;
01701     TransDataExtension *tx;
01702     Base *base = CTX_data_active_base(C);
01703     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01704     ParticleEditSettings *pset = PE_settings(t->scene);
01705     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(t->scene, ob);
01706     ParticleSystem *psys = NULL;
01707     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = NULL;
01708     PTCacheEditPoint *point;
01709     PTCacheEditKey *key;
01710     float mat[4][4];
01711     int i,k, transformparticle;
01712     int count = 0, hasselected = 0;
01713     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
01714 
01715     if (edit==NULL || t->settings->particle.selectmode==SCE_SELECT_PATH) return;
01716 
01717     psys = edit->psys;
01718 
01719     if (psys)
01720         psmd = psys_get_modifier(ob,psys);
01721 
01722     base->flag |= BA_HAS_RECALC_DATA;
01723 
01724     for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<edit->totpoint; i++, point++) {
01725         point->flag &= ~PEP_TRANSFORM;
01726         transformparticle= 0;
01727 
01728         if ((point->flag & PEP_HIDE)==0) {
01729             for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) {
01730                 if ((key->flag&PEK_HIDE)==0) {
01731                     if (key->flag&PEK_SELECT) {
01732                         hasselected= 1;
01733                         transformparticle= 1;
01734                     }
01735                     else if (propmode)
01736                         transformparticle= 1;
01737                 }
01738             }
01739         }
01740 
01741         if (transformparticle) {
01742             count += point->totkey;
01743             point->flag |= PEP_TRANSFORM;
01744         }
01745     }
01746 
01747      /* note: in prop mode we need at least 1 selected */
01748     if (hasselected==0) return;
01749 
01750     t->total = count;
01751     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total * sizeof(TransData), "TransObData(Particle Mode)");
01752 
01753     if (t->mode == TFM_BAKE_TIME)
01754         tx = t->ext = MEM_callocN(t->total * sizeof(TransDataExtension), "Particle_TransExtension");
01755     else
01756         tx = t->ext = NULL;
01757 
01758     unit_m4(mat);
01759 
01760     invert_m4_m4(ob->imat,ob->obmat);
01761 
01762     for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<edit->totpoint; i++, point++) {
01763         TransData *head, *tail;
01764         head = tail = td;
01765 
01766         if (!(point->flag & PEP_TRANSFORM)) continue;
01767 
01768         if (psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
01769             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + i, mat);
01770 
01771         for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) {
01772             if (key->flag & PEK_USE_WCO) {
01773                 copy_v3_v3(key->world_co, key->co);
01774                 mul_m4_v3(mat, key->world_co);
01775                 td->loc = key->world_co;
01776             }
01777             else
01778                 td->loc = key->co;
01779 
01780             copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
01781             copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01782 
01783             if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT)
01784                 td->flag |= TD_SELECTED;
01785             else if (!propmode)
01786                 td->flag |= TD_SKIP;
01787 
01788             unit_m3(td->mtx);
01789             unit_m3(td->smtx);
01790 
01791             /* don't allow moving roots */
01792             if (k==0 && pset->flag & PE_LOCK_FIRST && (!psys || !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)))
01793                 td->protectflag |= OB_LOCK_LOC;
01794 
01795             td->ob = ob;
01796             td->ext = tx;
01797             if (t->mode == TFM_BAKE_TIME) {
01798                 td->val = key->time;
01799                 td->ival = *(key->time);
01800                 /* abuse size and quat for min/max values */
01801                 td->flag |= TD_NO_EXT;
01802                 if (k==0) tx->size = NULL;
01803                 else tx->size = (key - 1)->time;
01804 
01805                 if (k == point->totkey - 1) tx->quat = NULL;
01806                 else tx->quat = (key + 1)->time;
01807             }
01808 
01809             td++;
01810             if (tx)
01811                 tx++;
01812             tail++;
01813         }
01814         if (propmode && head != tail)
01815             calc_distanceCurveVerts(head, tail - 1);
01816     }
01817 }
01818 
01819 void flushTransParticles(TransInfo *t)
01820 {
01821     Scene *scene = t->scene;
01822     Object *ob = OBACT;
01823     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01824     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
01825     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = NULL;
01826     PTCacheEditPoint *point;
01827     PTCacheEditKey *key;
01828     TransData *td;
01829     float mat[4][4], imat[4][4], co[3];
01830     int i, k, propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
01831 
01832     if (psys)
01833         psmd = psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
01834 
01835     /* we do transform in world space, so flush world space position
01836      * back to particle local space (only for hair particles) */
01837     td= t->data;
01838     for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<edit->totpoint; i++, point++, td++) {
01839         if (!(point->flag & PEP_TRANSFORM)) continue;
01840 
01841         if (psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
01842             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + i, mat);
01843             invert_m4_m4(imat,mat);
01844 
01845             for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) {
01846                 copy_v3_v3(co, key->world_co);
01847                 mul_m4_v3(imat, co);
01848 
01849 
01850                 /* optimization for proportional edit */
01851                 if (!propmode || !compare_v3v3(key->co, co, 0.0001f)) {
01852                     copy_v3_v3(key->co, co);
01853                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01854                 }
01855             }
01856         }
01857         else
01858             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01859     }
01860 
01861     PE_update_object(scene, OBACT, 1);
01862 }
01863 
01864 /* ********************* mesh ****************** */
01865 
01866 /* proportional distance based on connectivity  */
01867 #define THRESHOLDFACTOR (1.0f-0.0001f)
01868 
01869 /* I did this wrong, it should be a breadth-first search
01870  * but instead it's a depth-first search, fudged
01871  * to report shortest distances.  I have no idea how fast
01872  * or slow this is. */
01873 static void editmesh_set_connectivity_distance(BMEditMesh *em, float mtx[][3], float *dists)
01874 {
01875     BMVert **queue = NULL;
01876     float *dqueue = NULL;
01877     int *tots = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*em->bm->totvert, "tots editmesh_set_connectivity_distance");
01878     BLI_array_declare(queue);
01879     BLI_array_declare(dqueue);
01880     SmallHash svisit, *visit=&svisit;
01881     BMVert *v;
01882     BMIter viter;
01883     int i, start;
01884     
01885     fill_vn_fl(dists, em->bm->totvert, FLT_MAX);
01886 
01887     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT);
01888 
01889     BLI_smallhash_init(visit);
01890 
01891     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01892         if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)==0 || BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01893             continue;
01894             
01895         
01896         BLI_smallhash_insert(visit, (uintptr_t)v, NULL);
01897         BLI_array_append(queue, v);
01898         BLI_array_append(dqueue, 0.0f);
01899         dists[BM_elem_index_get(v)] = 0.0f;
01900     }
01901     
01902     start = 0;
01903     while (start < BLI_array_count(queue)) {
01904         BMIter eiter;
01905         BMEdge *e;
01906         BMVert *v3, *v2;
01907         float d, vec[3];
01908         
01909         v2 = queue[start];
01910         d = dqueue[start];
01911         
01912         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v2, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01913             float d2;
01914             v3 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, v2);
01915             
01916             if (BM_elem_flag_test(v3, BM_ELEM_SELECT) || BM_elem_flag_test(v3, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
01917                 continue;
01918             
01919             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, v2->co, v3->co);
01920             mul_m3_v3(mtx, vec);
01921             
01922             d2 = d + len_v3(vec);
01923             
01924             if (dists[BM_elem_index_get(v3)] != FLT_MAX)
01925                 dists[BM_elem_index_get(v3)] = MIN2(d2, dists[BM_elem_index_get(v3)]);
01926             else
01927                 dists[BM_elem_index_get(v3)] = d2;
01928             
01929             tots[BM_elem_index_get(v3)] = 1;
01930 
01931             if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(visit, (uintptr_t)v3))
01932                 continue;
01933             
01934             BLI_smallhash_insert(visit, (uintptr_t)v3, NULL);
01935             
01936             BLI_array_append(queue, v3);
01937             BLI_array_append(dqueue, d2);
01938         }
01939         
01940         start++;
01941     }
01942 
01943     BLI_smallhash_release(visit);
01944     
01945     for (i=0; i<em->bm->totvert; i++) {
01946         if (tots[i])
01947             dists[i] /= (float)tots[i];
01948     }
01949     
01950     BLI_array_free(queue);
01951     BLI_array_free(dqueue);
01952     MEM_freeN(tots);
01953 }
01954 
01955 /* loop-in-a-loop I know, but we need it! (ton) */
01956  static void get_face_center(float cent_r[3], BMVert *eve)
01957 
01958 {
01959     BMFace *efa;
01960     BMIter iter;
01961 
01962     BM_ITER_ELEM (efa, &iter, eve, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
01963         if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01964             BM_face_calc_center_mean(efa, cent_r);
01965             break;
01966         }
01967     }
01968 }
01969 
01970 static void get_edge_center(float cent_r[3], BMVert *eve)
01971 {
01972     BMEdge *eed;
01973     BMIter iter;
01974 
01975     BM_ITER_ELEM (eed, &iter, eve, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01976         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
01977             mid_v3_v3v3(cent_r, eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
01978             break;
01979         }
01980     }
01981 }
01982 
01983 /* way to overwrite what data is edited with transform */
01984 static void VertsToTransData(TransInfo *t, TransData *td, BMEditMesh *em, BMVert *eve, float *bweight)
01985 {
01986     td->flag = 0;
01987     //if (key)
01988     //  td->loc = key->co;
01989     //else
01990     td->loc = eve->co;
01991 
01992     copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
01993 
01994     if (t->around==V3D_LOCAL) {
01995         if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
01996             get_face_center(td->center, eve);
01997         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
01998             get_edge_center(td->center, eve);
01999     }
02000     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
02001 
02002     // Setting normals
02003     copy_v3_v3(td->axismtx[2], eve->no);
02004     td->axismtx[0][0]       =
02005         td->axismtx[0][1]   =
02006         td->axismtx[0][2]   =
02007         td->axismtx[1][0]   =
02008         td->axismtx[1][1]   =
02009         td->axismtx[1][2]   = 0.0f;
02010 
02011     td->ext = NULL;
02012     td->val = NULL;
02013     td->extra = NULL;
02014     if (t->mode == TFM_BWEIGHT) {
02015         td->val = bweight;
02016         td->ival = bweight ? *(bweight) : 1.0f;
02017     }
02018 }
02019 
02020 static void createTransEditVerts(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
02021 {
02022     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02023     TransData *tob = NULL;
02024     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(t->obedit);
02025     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
02026     BMVert *eve;
02027     BMIter iter;
02028     BMVert *eve_act = NULL;
02029     float *mappedcos = NULL, *quats= NULL;
02030     float mtx[3][3], smtx[3][3], (*defmats)[3][3] = NULL, (*defcos)[3] = NULL;
02031     float *dists=NULL;
02032     int count=0, countsel=0, a, totleft;
02033     int propmode = (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) ? (t->flag & (T_PROP_EDIT | T_PROP_CONNECTED)) : 0;
02034     int mirror = 0;
02035     char *selstate = NULL;
02036     short selectmode = ts->selectmode;
02037 
02038     if (t->flag & T_MIRROR)
02039     {
02040         EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin(em, TRUE);
02041         mirror = 1;
02042     }
02043 
02044     /* edge slide forces edge select */
02045     if (t->mode == TFM_EDGE_SLIDE) {
02046         selectmode = SCE_SELECT_EDGE;
02047     }
02048 
02049     /* BMESH_TODO, writing into the index values is BAD!, means we cant
02050      * use the values for vertex mirror - campbell */
02051 
02052     // transform now requires awareness for select mode, so we tag the f1 flags in verts
02053     if (selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
02054         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02055             BM_elem_flag_set(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG, BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
02056         }
02057     }
02058     else if (selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
02059         BMEdge *eed;
02060 
02061         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
02062         for ( ; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter)) BM_elem_flag_disable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02063 
02064         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
02065         for ( ; eed; eed=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
02066             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02067                 BM_elem_flag_enable(eed->v1, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02068                 BM_elem_flag_enable(eed->v2, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02069             }
02070         }
02071     }
02072     else {
02073         BMFace *efa;
02074         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
02075         for ( ; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter)) BM_elem_flag_disable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02076 
02077         efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
02078         for ( ; efa; efa=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
02079             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02080                 BMIter liter;
02081                 BMLoop *l;
02082 
02083                 l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa);
02084                 for (; l; l=BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
02085                     BM_elem_flag_enable(l->v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02086                 }
02087             }
02088         }
02089     }
02090 
02091     /* now we can count. we store selection state in selstate, since
02092      * get_crazy_mapped_editverts messes up the index state of the
02093      * verts*/
02094     selstate = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*selstate) * bm->totvert, __func__);
02095     eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
02096     for (a=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), a++) {
02097         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
02098             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02099                 selstate[a] = 1;
02100                 countsel++;
02101             }
02102             if (propmode) count++;
02103         }
02104     }
02105 
02106     /* note: in prop mode we need at least 1 selected */
02107     if (countsel == 0) {
02108         goto cleanup;
02109     }
02110 
02111     /* check active */
02112     if (em->bm->selected.last) {
02113         BMEditSelection *ese = em->bm->selected.last;
02114         if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
02115             eve_act = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
02116         }
02117     }
02118 
02119 
02120     if (propmode) {
02121         t->total = count;
02122 
02123         /* allocating scratch arrays */
02124         if (propmode & T_PROP_CONNECTED)
02125             dists = MEM_mallocN(em->bm->totvert * sizeof(float), "scratch nears");
02126     }
02127     else t->total = countsel;
02128 
02129     tob= t->data= MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransObData(Mesh EditMode)");
02130 
02131     copy_m3_m4(mtx, t->obedit->obmat);
02132     invert_m3_m3(smtx, mtx);
02133 
02134     if (propmode & T_PROP_CONNECTED) {
02135         editmesh_set_connectivity_distance(em, mtx, dists);
02136     }
02137 
02138     /* detect CrazySpace [tm] */
02139     if (modifiers_getCageIndex(t->scene, t->obedit, NULL, 1)>=0) {
02140         if (modifiers_isCorrectableDeformed(t->obedit)) {
02141             /* check if we can use deform matrices for modifier from the
02142              * start up to stack, they are more accurate than quats */
02143             totleft= editbmesh_get_first_deform_matrices(t->scene, t->obedit, em, &defmats, &defcos);
02144 
02145             /* if we still have more modifiers, also do crazyspace
02146              * correction with quats, relative to the coordinates after
02147              * the modifiers that support deform matrices (defcos) */
02148             if (totleft > 0) {
02149                 mappedcos= crazyspace_get_mapped_editverts(t->scene, t->obedit);
02150                 quats= MEM_mallocN( (t->total)*sizeof(float)*4, "crazy quats");
02151                 crazyspace_set_quats_editmesh(em, (float*)defcos, mappedcos, quats); /* BMESH_TODO, abuses vertex index, should use an int array */
02152                 if (mappedcos)
02153                     MEM_freeN(mappedcos);
02154             }
02155 
02156             if (defcos)
02157                 MEM_freeN(defcos);
02158         }
02159     }
02160 
02161     /* find out which half we do */
02162     if (mirror) {
02163         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
02164         for (a=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), a++) {
02165             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && selstate[a] && eve->co[0]!=0.0f) {
02166                 if (eve->co[0]<0.0f)
02167                 {
02168                     t->mirror = -1;
02169                     mirror = -1;
02170                 }
02171                 break;
02172             }
02173         }
02174     }
02175 
02176     eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
02177     for (a=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), a++) {
02178         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
02179             if (propmode || selstate[a]) {
