04097     Editing *ed= seq_give_editing(t->scene, FALSE);
04098 
04099     if (ed != NULL) {
04100         ListBase *seqbasep= ed->seqbasep;
04101         TransData *td= t->data;
04102         int a;
04103 
04104         /* prevent updating the same seq twice
04105          * if the transdata order is changed this will mess up
04106          * but so will TransDataSeq */
04107         Sequence *seq_prev= NULL;
04108         Sequence *seq;
04109 
04110 
04111         if (!(t->state == TRANS_CANCEL)) {
04112 
04113 #if 0       // default 2.4 behavior
04114 
04115             /* flush to 2d vector from internally used 3d vector */
04116             for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04117                 if ((seq != seq_prev) && (seq->depth==0) && (seq->flag & SEQ_OVERLAP)) {
04118                 seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04119                     shuffle_seq(seqbasep, seq);
04120                 }
04121 
04122                 seq_prev= seq;
04123             }
04124 
04125 #else       // durian hack
04126             {
04127                 int overlap= 0;
04128 
04129                 for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04130                     seq_prev= NULL;
04131                     seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04132                     if ((seq != seq_prev) && (seq->depth==0) && (seq->flag & SEQ_OVERLAP)) {
04133                         overlap= 1;
04134                         break;
04135                     }
04136                     seq_prev= seq;
04137                 }
04138 
04139                 if (overlap) {
04140                     int has_effect= 0;
04141                     for (seq= seqbasep->first; seq; seq= seq->next)
04142                         seq->tmp= NULL;
04143 
04144                     td= t->data;
04145                     seq_prev= NULL;
04146                     for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04147                         seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04148                         if ((seq != seq_prev)) {
04149                             /* check effects strips, we cant change their time */
04150                             if ((seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) && seq->seq1) {
04151                                 has_effect= TRUE;
04152                             }
04153                             else {
04154                                 /* Tag seq with a non zero value, used by shuffle_seq_time to identify the ones to shuffle */
04155                                 seq->tmp= (void*)1;
04156                             }
04157                         }
04158                     }
04159 
04160                     shuffle_seq_time(seqbasep, t->scene);
04161 
04162                     if (has_effect) {
04163                         /* update effects strips based on strips just moved in time */
04164                         td= t->data;
04165                         seq_prev= NULL;
04166                         for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04167                             seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04168                             if ((seq != seq_prev)) {
04169                                 if ((seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) && seq->seq1) {
04170                                     calc_sequence(t->scene, seq);
04171                                 }
04172                             }
04173                         }
04174 
04175                         /* now if any effects _still_ overlap, we need to move them up */
04176                         td= t->data;
04177                         seq_prev= NULL;
04178                         for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04179                             seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04180                             if ((seq != seq_prev)) {
04181                                 if ((seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) && seq->seq1) {
04182                                     if (seq_test_overlap(seqbasep, seq)) {
04183                                         shuffle_seq(seqbasep, seq, t->scene);
04184                                     }
04185                                 }
04186                             }
04187                         }
04188                         /* done with effects */
04189                     }
04190                 }
04191             }
04192 #endif
04193 
04194             for (seq= seqbasep->first; seq; seq= seq->next) {
04195                 /* We might want to build a list of effects that need to be updated during transform */
04196                 if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
04197                     if      (seq->seq1 && seq->seq1->flag & SELECT) calc_sequence(t->scene, seq);
04198                     else if (seq->seq2 && seq->seq2->flag & SELECT) calc_sequence(t->scene, seq);
04199                     else if (seq->seq3 && seq->seq3->flag & SELECT) calc_sequence(t->scene, seq);
04200                 }
04201             }
04202 
04203             sort_seq(t->scene);
04204         }
04205         else {
04206             /* Cancelled, need to update the strips display */
04207             for (a=0; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
04208                 seq= ((TransDataSeq *)td->extra)->seq;
04209                 if ((seq != seq_prev) && (seq->depth==0)) {
04210                     calc_sequence_disp(t->scene, seq);
04211                 }
04212                 seq_prev= seq;
04213             }
04214         }
04215     }
04216 
04217     if ((t->customData != NULL) && (t->flag & T_FREE_CUSTOMDATA)) {
04218         MEM_freeN(t->customData);
04219         t->customData = NULL;
04220     }
04221     if (t->data) {
04222         MEM_freeN(t->data); // XXX postTrans usually does this
04223         t->data= NULL;
04224     }
04225 }
04226 
04227 static void createTransSeqData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
04228 {
04229 #define XXX_DURIAN_ANIM_TX_HACK
04230 
04231     View2D *v2d= UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
04232     Scene *scene= t->scene;
04233     Editing *ed= seq_give_editing(t->scene, FALSE);
04234     TransData *td = NULL;
04235     TransData2D *td2d= NULL;
04236     TransDataSeq *tdsq= NULL;
04237 
04238     int count=0;
04239 
04240     if (ed==NULL) {
04241         t->total= 0;
04242         return;
04243     }
04244 
04245     t->customFree= freeSeqData;
04246 
04247     /* which side of the current frame should be allowed */
04248     if (t->mode == TFM_TIME_EXTEND) {
04249         /* only side on which mouse is gets transformed */
04250         float xmouse, ymouse;
04251 
04252         UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, t->imval[0], t->imval[1], &xmouse, &ymouse);
04253         t->frame_side = (xmouse > CFRA) ? 'R' : 'L';
04254     }
04255     else {
04256         /* normal transform - both sides of current frame are considered */
04257         t->frame_side = 'B';
04258     }
04259 
04260 #ifdef XXX_DURIAN_ANIM_TX_HACK
04261     {
04262         Sequence *seq;
04263         for (seq= ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq= seq->next) {
04264             /* hack */
04265             if ((seq->flag & SELECT)==0 && seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
04266                 Sequence *seq_user;
04267                 int i;
04268                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
04269                     seq_user= *((&seq->seq1) + i);
04270                     if ( seq_user && (seq_user->flag & SELECT) &&
04271                          !(seq_user->flag & SEQ_LOCK) &&
04272                          !(seq_user->flag & (SEQ_LEFTSEL|SEQ_RIGHTSEL)))
04273                     {
04274                         seq->flag |= SELECT;
04275                     }
04276                 }
04277             }
04278         }
04279     }
04280 #endif
04281 
04282     count = SeqTransCount(t, NULL, ed->seqbasep, 0);
04283 
04284     /* allocate memory for data */
04285     t->total= count;
04286 
04287     /* stop if trying to build list if nothing selected */
04288     if (count == 0) {
04289         return;
04290     }
04291 
04292     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransSeq TransData");
04293     td2d = t->data2d = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData2D), "TransSeq TransData2D");
04294     tdsq = t->customData = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataSeq), "TransSeq TransDataSeq");
04295     t->flag |= T_FREE_CUSTOMDATA;
04296 
04297 
04298 
04299     /* loop 2: build transdata array */
04300     SeqToTransData_Recursive(t, ed->seqbasep, td, td2d, tdsq);
04301 
04302 #undef XXX_DURIAN_ANIM_TX_HACK
04303 }
04304 
04305 
04306 /* *********************** Object Transform data ******************* */
04307 
04308 /* Little helper function for ObjectToTransData used to give certain
04309  * constraints (ChildOf, FollowPath, and others that may be added)
04310  * inverse corrections for transform, so that they aren't in CrazySpace.
04311  * These particular constraints benefit from this, but others don't, hence
04312  * this semi-hack ;-)    - Aligorith
04313  */
04314 static short constraints_list_needinv(TransInfo *t, ListBase *list)
04315 {
04316     bConstraint *con;
04317 
04318     /* loop through constraints, checking if there's one of the mentioned
04319      * constraints needing special crazyspace corrections
04320      */
04321     if (list) {
04322         for (con= list->first; con; con=con->next) {
04323             /* only consider constraint if it is enabled, and has influence on result */
04324             if ((con->flag & CONSTRAINT_DISABLE)==0 && (con->enforce!=0.0f)) {
04325                 /* (affirmative) returns for specific constraints here... */
04326                     /* constraints that require this regardless  */
04327                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_CHILDOF) return 1;
04328                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_FOLLOWPATH) return 1;
04329                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_CLAMPTO) return 1;
04330                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_OBJECTSOLVER) return 1;
04331                 
04332                     /* constraints that require this only under special conditions */
04333                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_ROTLIKE) {
04334                     /* CopyRot constraint only does this when rotating, and offset is on */
04335                     bRotateLikeConstraint *data = (bRotateLikeConstraint *)con->data;
04336                     
04337                     if ((data->flag & ROTLIKE_OFFSET) && (t->mode == TFM_ROTATION))
04338                         return 1;
04339                 }
04340             }
04341         }
04342     }
04343 
04344     /* no appropriate candidates found */
04345     return 0;
04346 }
04347 
04348 /* transcribe given object into TransData for Transforming */
04349 static void ObjectToTransData(TransInfo *t, TransData *td, Object *ob)
04350 {
04351     Scene *scene = t->scene;
04352     float obmtx[3][3];
04353     short constinv;
04354     short skip_invert = 0;
04355 
04356     /* axismtx has the real orientation */
04357     copy_m3_m4(td->axismtx, ob->obmat);
04358     normalize_m3(td->axismtx);
04359 
04360     td->con= ob->constraints.first;
04361 
04362     /* hack: temporarily disable tracking and/or constraints when getting
04363      *      object matrix, if tracking is on, or if constraints don't need
04364      *      inverse correction to stop it from screwing up space conversion
04365      *      matrix later
04366      */
04367     constinv = constraints_list_needinv(t, &ob->constraints);
04368 
04369     /* disable constraints inversion for dummy pass */
04370     if (t->mode == TFM_DUMMY)
04371         skip_invert = 1;
04372 
04373     if (skip_invert == 0 && constinv == 0) {
04374         if (constinv == 0)
04375             ob->transflag |= OB_NO_CONSTRAINTS; /* where_is_object_time checks this */
04376         
04377         where_is_object(t->scene, ob);
04378         
04379         if (constinv == 0)
04380             ob->transflag &= ~OB_NO_CONSTRAINTS;
04381     }
04382     else
04383         where_is_object(t->scene, ob);
04384 
04385     td->ob = ob;
04386 
04387     td->loc = ob->loc;
04388     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
04389     
04390     if (ob->rotmode > 0) {
04391         td->ext->rot= ob->rot;
04392         td->ext->rotAxis= NULL;
04393         td->ext->rotAngle= NULL;
04394         td->ext->quat= NULL;
04395         
04396         copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irot, ob->rot);
04397         copy_v3_v3(td->ext->drot, ob->drot);
04398     }
04399     else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
04400         td->ext->rot= NULL;
04401         td->ext->rotAxis= ob->rotAxis;
04402         td->ext->rotAngle= &ob->rotAngle;
04403         td->ext->quat= NULL;
04404         
04405         td->ext->irotAngle= ob->rotAngle;
04406         copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irotAxis, ob->rotAxis);
04407         // td->ext->drotAngle= ob->drotAngle;           // XXX, not implemented
04408         // copy_v3_v3(td->ext->drotAxis, ob->drotAxis); // XXX, not implemented
04409     }
04410     else {
04411         td->ext->rot= NULL;
04412         td->ext->rotAxis= NULL;
04413         td->ext->rotAngle= NULL;
04414         td->ext->quat= ob->quat;
04415         
04416         copy_qt_qt(td->ext->iquat, ob->quat);
04417         copy_qt_qt(td->ext->dquat, ob->dquat);
04418     }
04419     td->ext->rotOrder=ob->rotmode;
04420 
04421     td->ext->size = ob->size;
04422     copy_v3_v3(td->ext->isize, ob->size);
04423     copy_v3_v3(td->ext->dscale, ob->dscale);
04424 
04425     copy_v3_v3(td->center, ob->obmat[3]);
04426 
04427     copy_m4_m4(td->ext->obmat, ob->obmat);
04428 
04429     /* is there a need to set the global<->data space conversion matrices? */
04430     if (ob->parent || constinv) {
04431         float totmat[3][3], obinv[3][3];
04432 
04433         /* Get the effect of parenting, and/or certain constraints.
04434          * NOTE: some Constraints, and also Tracking should never get this
04435          *      done, as it doesn't work well.
04436          */
04437         object_to_mat3(ob, obmtx);
04438         copy_m3_m4(totmat, ob->obmat);
04439         invert_m3_m3(obinv, totmat);
04440         mul_m3_m3m3(td->smtx, obmtx, obinv);
04441         invert_m3_m3(td->mtx, td->smtx);
04442     }
04443     else {
04444         /* no conversion to/from dataspace */
04445         unit_m3(td->smtx);
04446         unit_m3(td->mtx);
04447     }
04448 
04449     /* set active flag */
04450     if (ob == OBACT)
04451     {
04452         td->flag |= TD_ACTIVE;
04453     }
04454 }
04455 
04456 
04457 /* sets flags in Bases to define whether they take part in transform */
04458 /* it deselects Bases, so we have to call the clear function always after */
04459 static void set_trans_object_base_flags(TransInfo *t)
04460 {
04461     Scene *scene = t->scene;
04462     View3D *v3d = t->view;
04463 
04464     /*
04465      * if Base selected and has parent selected:
04466      * base->flag= BA_WAS_SEL
04467      */
04468     Base *base;
04469 
04470     /* don't do it if we're not actually going to recalculate anything */
04471     if (t->mode == TFM_DUMMY)
04472         return;
04473 
04474     /* makes sure base flags and object flags are identical */
04475     copy_baseflags(t->scene);
04476 
04477     /* handle pending update events, otherwise they got copied below */
04478     for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04479         if (base->object->recalc)
04480             object_handle_update(t->scene, base->object);
04481     }
04482 
04483     for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04484         base->flag &= ~BA_WAS_SEL;
04485 
04486         if (TESTBASELIB_BGMODE(v3d, scene, base)) {
04487             Object *ob= base->object;
04488             Object *parsel= ob->parent;
04489 
04490             /* if parent selected, deselect */
04491             while (parsel) {
04492                 if (parsel->flag & SELECT) {
04493                     Base *parbase = object_in_scene(parsel, scene);
04494                     if (parbase) { /* in rare cases this can fail */
04495                         if (TESTBASELIB_BGMODE(v3d, scene, parbase)) {
04496                             break;
04497                         }
04498                     }
04499                 }
04500                 parsel= parsel->parent;
04501             }
04502 
04503             if (parsel)
04504             {
04505                 /* rotation around local centers are allowed to propagate */
04506                 if ((t->mode == TFM_ROTATION || t->mode == TFM_TRACKBALL)  && t->around == V3D_LOCAL) {
04507                     base->flag |= BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD;
04508                 }
04509                 else {
04510                     base->flag &= ~SELECT;
04511                     base->flag |= BA_WAS_SEL;
04512                 }
04513             }
04514             /* used for flush, depgraph will change recalcs if needed :) */
04515             ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
04516         }
04517     }
04518 
04519     /* all recalc flags get flushed to all layers, so a layer flip later on works fine */
04520     DAG_scene_flush_update(G.main, t->scene, -1, 0);
04521 
04522     /* and we store them temporal in base (only used for transform code) */
04523     /* this because after doing updates, the object->recalc is cleared */
04524     for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04525         if (base->object->recalc & OB_RECALC_OB)
04526             base->flag |= BA_HAS_RECALC_OB;
04527         if (base->object->recalc & OB_RECALC_DATA)
04528             base->flag |= BA_HAS_RECALC_DATA;
04529     }
04530 }
04531 
04532 static int mark_children(Object *ob)
04533 {
04534     if (ob->flag & (SELECT|BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD))
04535         return 1;
04536 
04537     if (ob->parent)
04538     {
04539         if (mark_children(ob->parent))
04540         {
04541             ob->flag |= BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD;
04542             return 1;
04543         }
04544     }
04545     
04546     return 0;
04547 }
04548 
04549 static int count_proportional_objects(TransInfo *t)
04550 {
04551     int total = 0;
04552     Scene *scene = t->scene;
04553     View3D *v3d = t->view;
04554     Base *base;
04555 
04556     /* rotations around local centers are allowed to propagate, so we take all objects */
04557     if (!((t->mode == TFM_ROTATION || t->mode == TFM_TRACKBALL)  && t->around == V3D_LOCAL))
04558     {
04559         /* mark all parents */
04560         for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04561             if (TESTBASELIB_BGMODE(v3d, scene, base)) {
04562                 Object *parent = base->object->parent;
04563     
04564                 /* flag all parents */
04565                 while (parent) {
04566                     parent->flag |= BA_TRANSFORM_PARENT;
04567                     parent = parent->parent;
04568                 }
04569             }
04570         }
04571 
04572         /* mark all children */
04573         for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04574             /* all base not already selected or marked that is editable */
04575             if ( (base->object->flag & (SELECT|BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD|BA_TRANSFORM_PARENT)) == 0 &&
04576                  (BASE_EDITABLE_BGMODE(v3d, scene, base)))
04577             {
04578                 mark_children(base->object);
04579             }
04580         }
04581     }
04582     
04583     for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04584         Object *ob= base->object;
04585 
04586         /* if base is not selected, not a parent of selection or not a child of selection and it is editable */
04587         if ( (ob->flag & (SELECT|BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD|BA_TRANSFORM_PARENT)) == 0 &&
04588              (BASE_EDITABLE_BGMODE(v3d, scene, base)))
04589         {
04590 
04591             /* used for flush, depgraph will change recalcs if needed :) */
04592             ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
04593 
04594             total += 1;
04595         }
04596     }
04597     
04598 
04599     /* all recalc flags get flushed to all layers, so a layer flip later on works fine */
04600     DAG_scene_flush_update(G.main, t->scene, -1, 0);
04601 
04602     /* and we store them temporal in base (only used for transform code) */
04603     /* this because after doing updates, the object->recalc is cleared */
04604     for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
04605         if (base->object->recalc & OB_RECALC_OB)
04606             base->flag |= BA_HAS_RECALC_OB;
04607         if (base->object->recalc & OB_RECALC_DATA)
04608             base->flag |= BA_HAS_RECALC_DATA;
04609     }
04610 
04611     return total;
04612 }
04613 
04614 static void clear_trans_object_base_flags(TransInfo *t)
04615 {
04616     Scene *sce = t->scene;
04617     Base *base;
04618 
04619     for (base= sce->base.first; base; base = base->next)
04620     {
04621         if (base->flag & BA_WAS_SEL)
04622             base->flag |= SELECT;
04623 
04624         base->flag &= ~(BA_WAS_SEL|BA_HAS_RECALC_OB|BA_HAS_RECALC_DATA|BA_TEMP_TAG|BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD|BA_TRANSFORM_PARENT);
04625     }
04626 }
04627 
04628 /* auto-keyframing feature - for objects
04629  *  tmode: should be a transform mode
04630  */
04631 // NOTE: context may not always be available, so must check before using it as it's a luxury for a few cases
04632 void autokeyframe_ob_cb_func(bContext *C, Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, Object *ob, int tmode)
04633 {
04634     ID *id= &ob->id;
04635     FCurve *fcu;
04636     
04637     // TODO: this should probably be done per channel instead...
04638     if (autokeyframe_cfra_can_key(scene, id)) {
04639         ReportList *reports = CTX_wm_reports(C);
04640         KeyingSet *active_ks = ANIM_scene_get_active_keyingset(scene);
04641         ListBase dsources = {NULL, NULL};
04642         float cfra= (float)CFRA; // xxx this will do for now
04643         short flag = 0;
04644         
04645         /* get flags used for inserting keyframes */
04646         flag = ANIM_get_keyframing_flags(scene, 1);
04647         
04648         /* add datasource override for the camera object */
04649         ANIM_relative_keyingset_add_source(&dsources, id, NULL, NULL); 
04650         
04651         if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, ONLYKEYINGSET) && (active_ks)) {
04652             /* only insert into active keyingset 
04653              * NOTE: we assume here that the active Keying Set does not need to have its iterator overridden spe
04654              */
04655             ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, active_ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04656         }
04657         else if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, INSERTAVAIL)) {
04658             AnimData *adt= ob->adt;
04659             
04660             /* only key on available channels */
04661             if (adt && adt->action) {
04662                 for (fcu= adt->action->curves.first; fcu; fcu= fcu->next) {
04663                     fcu->flag &= ~FCURVE_SELECTED;
04664                     insert_keyframe(reports, id, adt->action,
04665                                     (fcu->grp ? fcu->grp->name : NULL),
04666                                     fcu->rna_path, fcu->array_index, cfra, flag);
04667                 }
04668             }
04669         }
04670         else if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, INSERTNEEDED)) {
04671             short doLoc=0, doRot=0, doScale=0;
04672             
04673             /* filter the conditions when this happens (assume that curarea->spacetype==SPACE_VIE3D) */
04674             if (tmode == TFM_TRANSLATION) {
04675                 doLoc = 1;
04676             }
04677             else if (tmode == TFM_ROTATION) {
04678                 if (v3d->around == V3D_ACTIVE) {
04679                     if (ob != OBACT)
04680                         doLoc = 1;
04681                 }
04682                 else if (v3d->around == V3D_CURSOR)
04683                     doLoc = 1;
04684                 
04685                 if ((v3d->flag & V3D_ALIGN)==0)
04686                     doRot = 1;
04687             }
04688             else if (tmode == TFM_RESIZE) {
04689                 if (v3d->around == V3D_ACTIVE) {
04690                     if (ob != OBACT)
04691                         doLoc = 1;
04692                 }
04693                 else if (v3d->around == V3D_CURSOR)
04694                     doLoc = 1;
04695                 
04696                 if ((v3d->flag & V3D_ALIGN)==0)
04697                     doScale = 1;
04698             }
04699             
04700             /* insert keyframes for the affected sets of channels using the builtin KeyingSets found */
04701             if (doLoc) {
04702                 KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
04703                 ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04704             }
04705             if (doRot) {
04706                 KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_ROTATION_ID);
04707                 ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04708             }
04709             if (doScale) {
04710                 KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_SCALING_ID);
04711                 ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04712             }
04713         }
04714         /* insert keyframe in all (transform) channels */
04715         else {
04716             KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOC_ROT_SCALE_ID);
04717             ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04718         }
04719         
04720         /* free temp info */
04721         BLI_freelistN(&dsources);
04722     }
04723 }
04724 
04725 /* auto-keyframing feature - for poses/pose-channels
04726  *  tmode: should be a transform mode
04727  *  targetless_ik: has targetless ik been done on any channels?
04728  */
04729 // NOTE: context may not always be available, so must check before using it as it's a luxury for a few cases
04730 void autokeyframe_pose_cb_func(bContext *C, Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, Object *ob, int tmode, short targetless_ik)
04731 {
04732     ID *id= &ob->id;
04733     AnimData *adt= ob->adt;
04734     bAction *act= (adt) ? adt->action : NULL;
04735     bPose   *pose= ob->pose;
04736     bPoseChannel *pchan;
04737     FCurve *fcu;
04738     
04739     // TODO: this should probably be done per channel instead...
04740     if (autokeyframe_cfra_can_key(scene, id)) {
04741         ReportList *reports = CTX_wm_reports(C);
04742         KeyingSet *active_ks = ANIM_scene_get_active_keyingset(scene);
04743         float cfra= (float)CFRA;
04744         short flag= 0;
04745         
04746         /* flag is initialized from UserPref keyframing settings
04747          *  - special exception for targetless IK - INSERTKEY_MATRIX keyframes should get
04748          *    visual keyframes even if flag not set, as it's not that useful otherwise
04749          *    (for quick animation recording)
04750          */
04751         flag = ANIM_get_keyframing_flags(scene, 1);
04752         
04753         if (targetless_ik) 
04754             flag |= INSERTKEY_MATRIX;
04755         
04756         for (pchan=pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
04757             if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
04758                 ListBase dsources = {NULL, NULL};
04759                 
04760                 /* clear any 'unkeyed' flag it may have */
04761                 pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_UNKEYED;
04762                 
04763                 /* add datasource override for the camera object */
04764                 ANIM_relative_keyingset_add_source(&dsources, id, &RNA_PoseBone, pchan); 
04765                 
04766                 /* only insert into active keyingset? */
04767                 if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, ONLYKEYINGSET) && (active_ks)) {
04768                     /* run the active Keying Set on the current datasource */
04769                     ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, active_ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04770                 }
04771                 /* only insert into available channels? */
04772                 else if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, INSERTAVAIL)) {
04773                     if (act) {
04774                         for (fcu= act->curves.first; fcu; fcu= fcu->next) {
04775                             /* only insert keyframes for this F-Curve if it affects the current bone */
04776                             if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "bones")) {
04777                                 char *pchanName= BLI_getQuotedStr(fcu->rna_path, "bones[");
04778                                 
04779                                 /* only if bone name matches too... 
04780                                  * NOTE: this will do constraints too, but those are ok to do here too?
04781                                  */
04782                                 if (pchanName && strcmp(pchanName, pchan->name) == 0) 
04783                                     insert_keyframe(reports, id, act, ((fcu->grp)?(fcu->grp->name):(NULL)), fcu->rna_path, fcu->array_index, cfra, flag);
04784                                     
04785                                 if (pchanName) MEM_freeN(pchanName);
04786                             }
04787                         }
04788                     }
04789                 }
04790                 /* only insert keyframe if needed? */
04791                 else if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, INSERTNEEDED)) {
04792                     short doLoc=0, doRot=0, doScale=0;
04793                     
04794                     /* filter the conditions when this happens (assume that curarea->spacetype==SPACE_VIE3D) */
04795                     if (tmode == TFM_TRANSLATION) {
04796                         if (targetless_ik)
04797                             doRot= 1;
04798                         else
04799                             doLoc = 1;
04800                     }
04801                     else if (tmode == TFM_ROTATION) {
04802                         if (ELEM(v3d->around, V3D_CURSOR, V3D_ACTIVE))
04803                             doLoc = 1;
04804                             
04805                         if ((v3d->flag & V3D_ALIGN)==0)
04806                             doRot = 1;
04807                     }
04808                     else if (tmode == TFM_RESIZE) {
04809                         if (ELEM(v3d->around, V3D_CURSOR, V3D_ACTIVE))
04810                             doLoc = 1;
04811                             
04812                         if ((v3d->flag & V3D_ALIGN)==0)
04813                             doScale = 1;
04814                     }
04815                     
04816                     if (doLoc) {
04817                         KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
04818                         ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04819                     }
04820                     if (doRot) {
04821                         KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_ROTATION_ID);
04822                         ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04823                     }
04824                     if (doScale) {
04825                         KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_SCALING_ID);
04826                         ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04827                     }
04828                 }
04829                 /* insert keyframe in all (transform) channels */
04830                 else {
04831                     KeyingSet *ks= ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOC_ROT_SCALE_ID);
04832                     ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, cfra);
04833                 }
04834                 
04835                 /* free temp info */
04836                 BLI_freelistN(&dsources);
04837             }
04838         }
04839         
04840         /* do the bone paths 
04841          *  - only do this when there is context info, since we need that to resolve
04842          *    how to do the updates and so on...
04843          *  - do not calculate unless there are paths already to update...
04844          */
04845         if (C && (ob->pose->avs.path_bakeflag & MOTIONPATH_BAKE_HAS_PATHS)) {
04846             //ED_pose_clear_paths(C, ob); // XXX for now, don't need to clear
04847             ED_pose_recalculate_paths(scene, ob);
04848         }
04849     }
04850     else {
04851         /* tag channels that should have unkeyed data */
04852         for (pchan=pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
04853             if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_TRANSFORM) {
04854                 /* tag this channel */
04855                 pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_UNKEYED;
04856             }
04857         }
04858     }
04859 }
04860 
04861 
04862 /* inserting keys, pointcache, redraw events... */
04863 /* 
04864  * note: sequencer freeing has its own function now because of a conflict with transform's order of freeing (campbell)
04865  *       Order changed, the sequencer stuff should go back in here
04866  * */
04867 void special_aftertrans_update(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
04868 {
04869     Object *ob;
04870 //  short redrawipo=0, resetslowpar=1;
04871     int canceled= (t->state == TRANS_CANCEL);
04872     short duplicate= (t->mode == TFM_TIME_DUPLICATE);
04873     
04874     /* early out when nothing happened */
04875     if (t->total == 0 || t->mode == TFM_DUMMY)
04876         return;
04877     
04878     if (t->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D) {
04879         if (t->obedit) {
04880             if (canceled==0) {
04881                 /* we need to delete the temporary faces before automerging */
04882                 if (t->mode == TFM_EDGE_SLIDE) {
04883                     SlideData *sld = t->customData;
04884 
04885                     /* handle multires re-projection, done
04886                      * on transform completion since it's
04887                      * really slow -joeedh */
04888                     projectSVData(t, TRUE);
04889 
04890                     /* free temporary faces to avoid automerging and deleting
04891                      * during cleanup - psy-fi */
04892                     freeSlideTempFaces(sld);
04893                 }
04894                 EDBM_automerge(t->scene, t->obedit, 1);
04895             }
04896             else {
04897                 if (t->mode == TFM_EDGE_SLIDE) {
04898                     SlideData *sld = t->customData;
04899 
04900                     sld->perc = 0.0;
04901                     projectSVData(t, FALSE);
04902                 }
04903             }
04904         }
04905     }
04906     
04907     if (t->spacetype == SPACE_SEQ) {
04908         /* freeSeqData in transform_conversions.c does this
04909          * keep here so the else at the end wont run... */
04910 
04911         SpaceSeq *sseq= (SpaceSeq *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
04912 
04913         /* marker transform, not especially nice but we may want to move markers
04914          * at the same time as keyframes in the dope sheet. */
04915         if ((sseq->flag & SEQ_MARKER_TRANS) && (canceled == 0)) {
04916             /* cant use , TFM_TIME_EXTEND
04917              * for some reason EXTEND is changed into TRANSLATE, so use frame_side instead */
04918 
04919             if (t->mode == TFM_SEQ_SLIDE) {
04920                 if (t->frame_side == 'B')
04921                     ED_markers_post_apply_transform(&t->scene->markers, t->scene, TFM_TIME_TRANSLATE, t->values[0], t->frame_side);
04922             }
04923             else if (ELEM(t->frame_side, 'L', 'R')) {
04924                 ED_markers_post_apply_transform(&t->scene->markers, t->scene, TFM_TIME_EXTEND, t->values[0], t->frame_side);
04925             }
04926         }
04927 
04928     }
04929     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_NODE) {
04930         SpaceNode *snode= (SpaceNode *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
04931         ED_node_update_hierarchy(C, snode->edittree);
04932         
04933         if (canceled == 0)
04934             ED_node_link_insert(t->sa);
04935         
04936         /* clear link line */
04937         ED_node_link_intersect_test(t->sa, 0);
04938     }
04939     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_CLIP) {
04940         SpaceClip *sc = t->sa->spacedata.first;
04941         MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
04942 
04943         if (t->scene->nodetree) {
04944             /* tracks can be used for stabilization nodes,
04945              * flush update for such nodes */
04946             nodeUpdateID(t->scene->nodetree, &clip->id);
04947             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_NODES, NULL);
04948         }
04949     }
04950     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
04951         SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
04952         bAnimContext ac;
04953         
04954         /* initialize relevant anim-context 'context' data */
04955         if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
04956             return;
04957             
04958         ob = ac.obact;
04959         
04960         if (ELEM(ac.datatype, ANIMCONT_DOPESHEET, ANIMCONT_SHAPEKEY)) {
04961             ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
04962             bAnimListElem *ale;
04963             short filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT /*| ANIMFILTER_CURVESONLY*/);
04964             
04965             /* get channels to work on */
04966             ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
04967             
04968             /* these should all be F-Curves */
04969             for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
04970                 AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(&ac, ale);
04971                 FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
04972                 
04973                 /* 3 cases here for curve cleanups:
04974                  * 1) NOTRANSKEYCULL on     -> cleanup of duplicates shouldn't be done
04975                  * 2) canceled == 0        -> user confirmed the transform, so duplicates should be removed
04976                  * 3) canceled + duplicate -> user canceled the transform, but we made duplicates, so get rid of these
04977                  */
04978                 if ( (saction->flag & SACTION_NOTRANSKEYCULL)==0 &&
04979                      ((canceled == 0) || (duplicate)) )
04980                 {
04981                     if (adt) {
04982                         ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, fcu, 0, 1);
04983                         posttrans_fcurve_clean(fcu, FALSE); /* only use handles in graph editor */
04984                         ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, fcu, 1, 1);
04985                     }
04986                     else
04987                         posttrans_fcurve_clean(fcu, FALSE); /* only use handles in graph editor */
04988                 }
04989             }
04990             
04991             /* free temp memory */
04992             BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
04993         }
04994         else if (ac.datatype == ANIMCONT_ACTION) { // TODO: just integrate into the above...
04995             /* Depending on the lock status, draw necessary views */
04996             // fixme... some of this stuff is not good
04997             if (ob) {
04998                 if (ob->pose || ob_get_key(ob))
04999                     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA|OB_RECALC_TIME);
05000                 else
05001                     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
05002             }
05003             
05004             /* 3 cases here for curve cleanups:
05005              * 1) NOTRANSKEYCULL on     -> cleanup of duplicates shouldn't be done
05006              * 2) canceled == 0        -> user confirmed the transform, so duplicates should be removed
05007              * 3) canceled + duplicate -> user canceled the transform, but we made duplicates, so get rid of these
05008              */
05009             if ( (saction->flag & SACTION_NOTRANSKEYCULL)==0 &&
05010                  ((canceled == 0) || (duplicate)) )
05011             {
05012                 posttrans_action_clean(&ac, (bAction *)ac.data);
05013             }
05014         }
05015         else if (ac.datatype == ANIMCONT_GPENCIL) {
05016             /* remove duplicate frames and also make sure points are in order! */
05017                 /* 3 cases here for curve cleanups:
05018                  * 1) NOTRANSKEYCULL on     -> cleanup of duplicates shouldn't be done
05019                  * 2) canceled == 0        -> user confirmed the transform, so duplicates should be removed
05020                  * 3) canceled + duplicate -> user canceled the transform, but we made duplicates, so get rid of these
05021                  */
05022             if ( (saction->flag & SACTION_NOTRANSKEYCULL)==0 &&
05023                  ((canceled == 0) || (duplicate)) )
05024             {
05025                 bGPdata *gpd;
05026                 
05027                 // XXX: BAD! this get gpencil datablocks directly from main db...
05028                 // but that's how this currently works :/
05029                 for (gpd = G.main->gpencil.first; gpd; gpd = gpd->id.next) {
05030                     if (ID_REAL_USERS(gpd))
05031                         posttrans_gpd_clean(gpd);
05032                 }
05033             }
05034         }
05035         
05036         /* marker transform, not especially nice but we may want to move markers
05037          * at the same time as keyframes in the dope sheet. 
05038          */
05039         if ((saction->flag & SACTION_MARKERS_MOVE) && (canceled == 0)) {
05040             if (t->mode == TFM_TIME_TRANSLATE) {
05041 #if 0
05042                 if (ELEM(t->frame_side, 'L', 'R')) { /* TFM_TIME_EXTEND */
05043                     /* same as below */
05044                     ED_markers_post_apply_transform(ED_context_get_markers(C), t->scene, t->mode, t->values[0], t->frame_side);
05045                 }
05046                 else /* TFM_TIME_TRANSLATE */
05047 #endif
05048                 {
05049                     ED_markers_post_apply_transform(ED_context_get_markers(C), t->scene, t->mode, t->values[0], t->frame_side);
05050                 }
05051             }
05052             else if (t->mode == TFM_TIME_SCALE) {
05053                 ED_markers_post_apply_transform(ED_context_get_markers(C), t->scene, t->mode, t->values[0], t->frame_side);
05054             }
05055         }
05056         
05057         /* make sure all F-Curves are set correctly */
05058         if (ac.datatype != ANIMCONT_GPENCIL)
05059             ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
05060         
05061         /* clear flag that was set for time-slide drawing */
05062         saction->flag &= ~SACTION_MOVING;
05063     }
05064     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) {
05065         SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
05066         bAnimContext ac;
05067         const short use_handle = !(sipo->flag & SIPO_NOHANDLES);
05068         
05069         /* initialize relevant anim-context 'context' data */
05070         if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
05071             return;
05072         
05073         if (ac.datatype)
05074         {
05075             ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
05076             bAnimListElem *ale;
05077             short filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE);
05078             
05079             /* get channels to work on */
05080             ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
05081             
05082             for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
05083                 AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(&ac, ale);
05084                 FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
05085                 
05086                 /* 3 cases here for curve cleanups:
05087                  * 1) NOTRANSKEYCULL on     -> cleanup of duplicates shouldn't be done
05088                  * 2) canceled == 0        -> user confirmed the transform, so duplicates should be removed
05089                  * 3) canceled + duplicate -> user canceled the transform, but we made duplicates, so get rid of these
05090                  */
05091                 if ( (sipo->flag & SIPO_NOTRANSKEYCULL)==0 &&
05092                      ((canceled == 0) || (duplicate)) )
05093                 {
05094                     if (adt) {
05095                         ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, fcu, 0, 0);
05096                         posttrans_fcurve_clean(fcu, use_handle);
05097                         ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, fcu, 1, 0);
05098                     }
05099                     else
05100                         posttrans_fcurve_clean(fcu, use_handle);
05101                 }
05102             }
05103             
05104             /* free temp memory */
05105             BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
05106         }
05107         
05108         /* Make sure all F-Curves are set correctly, but not if transform was
05109          * canceled, since then curves were already restored to initial state.
05110          * Note: if the refresh is really needed after cancel then some way
05111          *       has to be added to not update handle types (see bug 22289).
05112          */
05113         if (!canceled)
05114             ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
05115     }
05116     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_NLA) {
05117         bAnimContext ac;
05118         
05119         /* initialize relevant anim-context 'context' data */
05120         if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
05121             return;
05122             
05123         if (ac.datatype)
05124         {
05125             ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
05126             bAnimListElem *ale;
05127             short filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT);
05128             
05129             /* get channels to work on */
05130             ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
05131             
05132             for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
05133                 NlaTrack *nlt= (NlaTrack *)ale->data;
05134                 
05135                 /* make sure strips are in order again */
05136                 BKE_nlatrack_sort_strips(nlt);
05137                 
05138                 /* remove the temp metas */
05139                 BKE_nlastrips_clear_metas(&nlt->strips, 0, 1);
05140             }
05141             
05142             /* free temp memory */
05143             BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
05144             
05145             /* perform after-transfrom validation */
05146             ED_nla_postop_refresh(&ac);
05147         }
05148     }
05149     else if (t->obedit) {
05150         if (t->obedit->type == OB_MESH)
05151         {
05152             BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(t->obedit);
05153             /* table needs to be created for each edit command, since vertices can move etc */
05154             mesh_octree_table(t->obedit, em, NULL, 'e');
05155         }
05156     }
05157     else if ((t->flag & T_POSE) && (t->poseobj)) {
05158         bArmature *arm;
05159         bPoseChannel *pchan;
05160         short targetless_ik= 0;
05161 
05162         ob= t->poseobj;
05163         arm= ob->data;
05164 
05165         if ((t->flag & T_AUTOIK) && (t->options & CTX_AUTOCONFIRM)) {
05166             /* when running transform non-interactively (operator exec),
05167              * we need to update the pose otherwise no updates get called during
05168              * transform and the auto-ik is not applied. see [#26164] */
05169             struct Object *pose_ob=t->poseobj;
05170             where_is_pose(t->scene, pose_ob);
05171         }
05172 
05173         /* set BONE_TRANSFORM flags for autokey, manipulator draw might have changed them */
05174         if (!canceled && (t->mode != TFM_DUMMY))
05175             count_set_pose_transflags(&t->mode, t->around, ob);
05176 
05177         /* if target-less IK grabbing, we calculate the pchan transforms and clear flag */
05178         if (!canceled && t->mode==TFM_TRANSLATION)
05179             targetless_ik= apply_targetless_ik(ob);
05180         else {
05181             /* not forget to clear the auto flag */
05182             for (pchan=ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan=pchan->next) {
05183                 bKinematicConstraint *data= has_targetless_ik(pchan);
05184                 if (data) data->flag &= ~CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO;
05185             }
05186         }
05187 
05188         if (t->mode==TFM_TRANSLATION)
05189             pose_grab_with_ik_clear(ob);
05190 
05191         /* automatic inserting of keys and unkeyed tagging - only if transform wasn't canceled (or TFM_DUMMY) */
05192         if (!canceled && (t->mode != TFM_DUMMY)) {
05193             autokeyframe_pose_cb_func(C, t->scene, (View3D *)t->view, ob, t->mode, targetless_ik);
05194             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
05195         }
05196         else if (arm->flag & ARM_DELAYDEFORM) {
05197             /* old optimize trick... this enforces to bypass the depgraph */
05198             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
05199             ob->recalc= 0;  // is set on OK position already by recalcData()
05200         }
05201         else
05202             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
05203 
05204     }
05205     else if ( (t->scene->basact) &&
05206               (ob = t->scene->basact->object) &&
05207               (ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) &&
05208               PE_get_current(t->scene, ob))
05209     {
05210         /* do nothing */
05211     }
05212     else { /* Objects */
05213         int i, recalcObPaths=0;
05214 
05215         for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++) {
05216             TransData *td = t->data + i;
05217             ListBase pidlist;
05218             PTCacheID *pid;
05219             ob = td->ob;
05220 
05221             if (td->flag & TD_NOACTION)
05222                 break;
05223             
05224             if (td->flag & TD_SKIP)
05225                 continue;
05226 
05227             /* flag object caches as outdated */
05228             BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, t->scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
05229             for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
05230                 if (pid->type != PTCACHE_TYPE_PARTICLES) /* particles don't need reset on geometry change */
05231                     pid->cache->flag |= PTCACHE_OUTDATED;
05232             }
05233             BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
05234 
05235             /* pointcache refresh */
05236             if (BKE_ptcache_object_reset(t->scene, ob, PTCACHE_RESET_OUTDATED))
05237                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_DATA;
05238 
05239             /* Needed for proper updating of "quick cached" dynamics. */
05240             /* Creates troubles for moving animated objects without */
05241             /* autokey though, probably needed is an anim sys override? */
05242             /* Please remove if some other solution is found. -jahka */
05243             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
05244 
05245             /* Set autokey if necessary */
05246             if (!canceled) {
05247                 autokeyframe_ob_cb_func(C, t->scene, (View3D *)t->view, ob, t->mode);
05248                 
05249                 /* only calculate paths if there are paths to be recalculated */
05250                 if (ob->avs.path_bakeflag & MOTIONPATH_BAKE_HAS_PATHS)
05251                     recalcObPaths= 1;
05252             }
05253         }
05254         
05255         /* recalculate motion paths for objects (if necessary) 
05256          * NOTE: only do this when there is context info
05257          */
05258         if (C && recalcObPaths) {
05259             //ED_objects_clear_paths(C); // XXX for now, don't need to clear
05260             ED_objects_recalculate_paths(C, t->scene);
05261 
05262             /* recalculating the frame positions means we loose our original transform if its not auto-keyed [#24451]
05263              * this hack re-applies it, which is annoying, only alternatives are...
05264              * - don't recalc paths.
05265              * - have an object_handle_update() which gives is the new transform without touching the objects.
05266              * - only recalc paths on auto-keying.
05267              * - ED_objects_recalculate_paths could backup/restore transforms.
05268              * - re-apply the transform which is simplest in this case. (2 lines below)
05269              */
05270             t->redraw |= TREDRAW_HARD;
05271             transformApply(C, t);
05272         }
05273     }
05274 
05275     clear_trans_object_base_flags(t);
05276 
05277 
05278 #if 0 // TRANSFORM_FIX_ME
05279     if (resetslowpar)
05280         reset_slowparents();
05281 #endif
05282 }
05283 
05284 static void createTransObject(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05285 {
05286     TransData *td = NULL;
05287     TransDataExtension *tx;
05288     int propmode = t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT;
05289 
05290     set_trans_object_base_flags(t);
05291 
05292     /* count */
05293     t->total= CTX_DATA_COUNT(C, selected_objects);
05294     
05295     if (!t->total) {
05296         /* clear here, main transform function escapes too */
05297         clear_trans_object_base_flags(t);
05298         return;
05299     }
05300     
05301     if (propmode)
05302     {
05303         t->total += count_proportional_objects(t);
05304     }
05305 
05306     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransOb");
05307     tx = t->ext = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataExtension), "TransObExtension");
05308 
05309     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_bases)
05310     {
05311         Object *ob= base->object;
05312         
05313         td->flag = TD_SELECTED;
05314         td->protectflag= ob->protectflag;
05315         td->ext = tx;
05316         td->ext->rotOrder= ob->rotmode;
05317         
05318         if (base->flag & BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD)
05319         {
05320             td->flag |= TD_NOCENTER;
05321             td->flag |= TD_NO_LOC;
05322         }
05323         
05324         /* select linked objects, but skip them later */
05325         if (ob->id.lib != NULL) {
05326             td->flag |= TD_SKIP;
05327         }
05328         
05329         ObjectToTransData(t, td, ob);
05330         td->val = NULL;
05331         td++;
05332         tx++;
05333     }
05334     CTX_DATA_END;
05335     
05336     if (propmode)
05337     {
05338         Scene *scene = t->scene;
05339         View3D *v3d = t->view;
05340         Base *base;
05341 
05342         for (base= scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
05343             Object *ob= base->object;
05344 
05345             /* if base is not selected, not a parent of selection or not a child of selection and it is editable */
05346             if ((ob->flag & (SELECT|BA_TRANSFORM_CHILD|BA_TRANSFORM_PARENT)) == 0 && BASE_EDITABLE_BGMODE(v3d, scene, base))
05347             {
05348                 td->protectflag= ob->protectflag;
05349                 td->ext = tx;
05350                 td->ext->rotOrder= ob->rotmode;
05351                 
05352                 ObjectToTransData(t, td, ob);
05353                 td->val = NULL;
05354                 td++;
05355                 tx++;
05356             }
05357         }
05358     }
05359 }
05360 
05361 /* transcribe given node into TransData2D for Transforming */
05362 static void NodeToTransData(TransData *td, TransData2D *td2d, bNode *node)
05363 // static void NodeToTransData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t, TransData2D *td, bNode *node)
05364 {
05365     td2d->loc[0] = node->locx; /* hold original location */
05366     td2d->loc[1] = node->locy;
05367     td2d->loc[2] = 0.0f;
05368     td2d->loc2d = &node->locx; /* current location */
05369 
05370     td->flag = 0;
05371     /* exclude nodes whose parent is also transformed */
05372     if (node->parent && (node->parent->flag & NODE_TRANSFORM)) {
05373         td->flag |= TD_SKIP;
05374     }
05375 
05376     td->loc = td2d->loc;
05377     copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
05378     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
05379 
05380     memset(td->axismtx, 0, sizeof(td->axismtx));
05381     td->axismtx[2][2] = 1.0f;
05382 
05383     td->ext= NULL; td->val= NULL;
05384 
05385     td->flag |= TD_SELECTED;
05386     td->dist= 0.0;
05387 
05388     unit_m3(td->mtx);
05389     unit_m3(td->smtx);
05390 }
05391 
05392 static void createTransNodeData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05393 {
05394     TransData *td;
05395     TransData2D *td2d;
05396     SpaceNode *snode= t->sa->spacedata.first;
05397     bNode *node;
05398 
05399     if (!snode->edittree) {
05400         t->total= 0;
05401         return;
05402     }
05403 
05404     /* set transform flags on nodes */
05405     for (node=snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node=node->next) {
05406         if ((node->flag & NODE_SELECT) || (node->parent && (node->parent->flag & NODE_TRANSFORM)))
05407             node->flag |= NODE_TRANSFORM;
05408         else
05409             node->flag &= ~NODE_TRANSFORM;
05410     }
05411 
05412     t->total= CTX_DATA_COUNT(C, selected_nodes);
05413 
05414     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransNode TransData");
05415     td2d = t->data2d = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData2D), "TransNode TransData2D");
05416 
05417     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bNode *, selnode, selected_nodes)
05418         NodeToTransData(td++, td2d++, selnode);
05419     CTX_DATA_END
05420 }
05421 
05422 /* *** CLIP EDITOR *** */
05423 
05424 enum {
05425     transDataTracking_ModeTracks = 0,
05426     transDataTracking_ModeCurves = 1,
05427 } transDataTracking_Mode;
05428 
05429 typedef struct TransDataTracking {
05430     int mode, flag;
05431 
05432     /* tracks transformation from main window */
05433     int area;
05434     float *relative, *loc;
05435     float soffset[2], srelative[2];
05436     float offset[2];
05437 
05438     float (*smarkers)[2];
05439     int markersnr;
05440     MovieTrackingMarker *markers;
05441 
05442     /* marker transformation from curves editor */
05443     float *prev_pos, scale;
05444     short coord;
05445 } TransDataTracking;
05446 
05447 static void markerToTransDataInit(TransData *td, TransData2D *td2d, TransDataTracking *tdt, MovieTrackingTrack *track,
05448                                   int area, float *loc, float *rel, float *off)
05449 {
05450     int anchor = area == TRACK_AREA_POINT && off;
05451 
05452     tdt->mode = transDataTracking_ModeTracks;
05453 
05454     if (anchor) {
05455         td2d->loc[0] = rel[0]; /* hold original location */
05456         td2d->loc[1] = rel[1];
05457 
05458         tdt->loc= loc;
05459         td2d->loc2d = loc; /* current location */
05460     }
05461     else {
05462         td2d->loc[0] = loc[0]; /* hold original location */
05463         td2d->loc[1] = loc[1];
05464 
05465         td2d->loc2d = loc; /* current location */
05466     }
05467     td2d->loc[2] = 0.0f;
05468 
05469     tdt->relative = rel;
05470     tdt->area = area;
05471 
05472     tdt->markersnr = track->markersnr;
05473     tdt->markers = track->markers;
05474 
05475     if (rel) {
05476         if (!anchor) {
05477             td2d->loc[0] += rel[0];
05478             td2d->loc[1] += rel[1];
05479         }
05480 
05481         copy_v2_v2(tdt->srelative, rel);
05482     }
05483 
05484     if (off)
05485         copy_v2_v2(tdt->soffset, off);
05486 
05487     td->flag = 0;
05488     td->loc = td2d->loc;
05489     copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
05490     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
05491 
05492     memset(td->axismtx, 0, sizeof(td->axismtx));
05493     td->axismtx[2][2] = 1.0f;
05494 
05495     td->ext= NULL;
05496     td->val= NULL;
05497 
05498     td->flag |= TD_SELECTED;
05499     td->dist = 0.0;
05500 
05501     unit_m3(td->mtx);
05502     unit_m3(td->smtx);
05503 }
05504 
05505 static void trackToTransData(SpaceClip *sc, TransData *td, TransData2D *td2d,
05506                              TransDataTracking *tdt, MovieTrackingTrack *track)
05507 {
05508     MovieTrackingMarker *marker = BKE_tracking_ensure_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
05509 
05510     tdt->flag = marker->flag;
05511     marker->flag &= ~(MARKER_DISABLED|MARKER_TRACKED);
05512 
05513     markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_POINT, track->offset, marker->pos, track->offset);
05514 
05515     if (track->flag & SELECT)
05516         markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_POINT, marker->pos, NULL, NULL);
05517 
05518     if (track->pat_flag & SELECT) {
05519         markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_PAT, track->pat_min, marker->pos, NULL);
05520         markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_PAT, track->pat_max, marker->pos, NULL);
05521     }
05522 
05523     if (track->search_flag & SELECT) {
05524         markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, track->search_min, marker->pos, NULL);
05525         markerToTransDataInit(td++, td2d++, tdt++, track, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH, track->search_max, marker->pos, NULL);
05526     }
05527 }
05528 
05529 static void transDataTrackingFree(TransInfo *t)
05530 {
05531     TransDataTracking *tdt = t->customData;
05532 
05533     if (tdt) {
05534         if (tdt->smarkers)
05535             MEM_freeN(tdt->smarkers);
05536 
05537         MEM_freeN(tdt);
05538     }
05539 }
05540 
05541 static void createTransTrackingTracksData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05542 {
05543     TransData *td;
05544     TransData2D *td2d;
05545     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
05546     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
05547     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
05548     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
05549     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
05550     TransDataTracking *tdt;
05551     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
05552 
05553     /* count */
05554     t->total = 0;
05555 
05556     track = tracksbase->first;
05557     while (track) {
05558         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
05559             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
05560 
05561             t->total++; /* offset */
05562 
05563             if (track->flag & SELECT)
05564                 t->total++;
05565 
05566             if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
05567                 t->total+= 2;
05568 
05569             if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
05570                 t->total+= 2;
05571         }
05572 
05573         track = track->next;
05574     }
05575 
05576     if (t->total == 0)
05577         return;
05578 
05579     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransTracking TransData");
05580     td2d = t->data2d = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData2D), "TransTracking TransData2D");
05581     tdt = t->customData = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataTracking), "TransTracking TransDataTracking");
05582 
05583     t->customFree = transDataTrackingFree;
05584 
05585     /* create actual data */
05586     track = tracksbase->first;
05587     while (track) {
05588         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) == 0) {
05589             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
05590 
05591             trackToTransData(sc, td, td2d, tdt, track);
05592 
05593             /* offset */
05594             td++;
05595             td2d++;
05596             tdt++;
05597 
05598             if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0) {
05599                 if (track->flag & SELECT) {
05600                     td++;
05601                     td2d++;
05602                     tdt++;
05603                 }
05604 
05605                 if (track->pat_flag & SELECT) {
05606                     td += 2;
05607                     td2d += 2;
05608                     tdt +=2;
05609                 }
05610             }
05611 
05612             if (track->search_flag & SELECT) {
05613                 td += 2;
05614                 td2d += 2;
05615                 tdt += 2;
05616 
05617                 if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) {
05618                     td += 3;
05619                     td2d += 3;
05620                     tdt += 3;
05621                 };
05622             }
05623         }
05624 
05625         track = track->next;
05626     }
05627 }
05628 
05629 static void markerToTransCurveDataInit(TransData *td, TransData2D *td2d, TransDataTracking *tdt,
05630                                        MovieTrackingMarker *marker, MovieTrackingMarker *prev_marker,
05631                                        short coord, float size)
05632 {
05633     float frames_delta = (marker->framenr - prev_marker->framenr);
05634 
05635     tdt->flag = marker->flag;
05636     marker->flag &= ~MARKER_TRACKED;
05637 
05638     tdt->mode = transDataTracking_ModeCurves;
05639     tdt->coord = coord;
05640     tdt->scale = 1.0f / size * frames_delta;
05641     tdt->prev_pos = prev_marker->pos;
05642 
05643     /* calculate values depending on marker's speed */
05644     td2d->loc[0] = marker->framenr;
05645     td2d->loc[1] = (marker->pos[coord] - prev_marker->pos[coord]) * size / frames_delta;
05646     td2d->loc[2] = 0.0f;
05647 
05648     td2d->loc2d = marker->pos; /* current location */
05649 
05650     td->flag = 0;
05651     td->loc = td2d->loc;
05652     copy_v3_v3(td->center, td->loc);
05653     copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
05654 
05655     memset(td->axismtx, 0, sizeof(td->axismtx));
05656     td->axismtx[2][2] = 1.0f;
05657 
05658     td->ext= NULL;
05659     td->val= NULL;
05660 
05661     td->flag |= TD_SELECTED;
05662     td->dist = 0.0;
05663 
05664     unit_m3(td->mtx);
05665     unit_m3(td->smtx);
05666 }
05667 
05668 static void createTransTrackingCurvesData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05669 {
05670     TransData *td;
05671     TransData2D *td2d;
05672     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
05673     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
05674     ListBase *tracksbase= BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
05675     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
05676     MovieTrackingMarker *marker, *prev_marker;
05677     TransDataTracking *tdt;
05678     int i, width, height;
05679 
05680     BKE_movieclip_get_size(clip, &sc->user, &width, &height);
05681 
05682     /* count */
05683     t->total = 0;
05684 
05685     track = tracksbase->first;
05686     while (track) {
05687         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
05688             for (i = 1; i < track->markersnr; i++) {
05689                 marker = &track->markers[i];
05690                 prev_marker = &track->markers[i-1];
05691 
05692                 if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) || (prev_marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED))
05693                     continue;
05694 
05695                 if (marker->flag & MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X)
05696                     t->total += 1;
05697 
05698                 if (marker->flag & MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y)
05699                     t->total += 1;
05700             }
05701         }
05702 
05703         track = track->next;
05704     }
05705 
05706     if (t->total == 0)
05707         return;
05708 
05709     td = t->data = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData), "TransTracking TransData");
05710     td2d = t->data2d = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransData2D), "TransTracking TransData2D");
05711     tdt = t->customData = MEM_callocN(t->total*sizeof(TransDataTracking), "TransTracking TransDataTracking");
05712 
05713     t->customFree = transDataTrackingFree;
05714 
05715     /* create actual data */
05716     track = tracksbase->first;
05717     while (track) {
05718         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
05719             for (i = 1; i < track->markersnr; i++) {
05720                 marker = &track->markers[i];
05721                 prev_marker = &track->markers[i-1];
05722 
05723                 if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) || (prev_marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED))
05724                     continue;
05725 
05726                 if (marker->flag & MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X) {
05727                     markerToTransCurveDataInit(td, td2d, tdt, marker, &track->markers[i-1], 0, width);
05728                     td += 1;
05729                     td2d += 1;
05730                     tdt += 1;
05731                 }
05732 
05733                 if (marker->flag & MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y) {
05734                     markerToTransCurveDataInit(td, td2d, tdt, marker, &track->markers[i-1], 1, height);
05735 
05736                     td += 1;
05737                     td2d += 1;
05738                     tdt += 1;
05739                 }
05740             }
05741         }
05742 
05743         track = track->next;
05744     }
05745 }
05746 
05747 static void createTransTrackingData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05748 {
05749     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
05750     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
05751     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
05752 
05753     t->total = 0;
05754 
05755     if (!clip || !BKE_movieclip_has_frame(clip, &sc->user))
05756         return;
05757 
05758     if (!ELEM(t->mode, TFM_RESIZE, TFM_TRANSLATION))
05759         return;
05760 
05761     if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW) {
05762         /* transformation was called from graph editor */
05763         createTransTrackingCurvesData(C, t);
05764     }
05765     else {
05766         createTransTrackingTracksData(C, t);
05767     }
05768 }
05769 
05770 static void cancelTransTracking(TransInfo *t)
05771 {
05772     TransDataTracking *tdt = t->customData;
05773     SpaceClip *sc = t->sa->spacedata.first;
05774     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
05775     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
05776     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
05777     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
05778     int a, framenr = sc->user.framenr;
05779 
05780     if (tdt->mode == transDataTracking_ModeTracks) {
05781         track = tracksbase->first;
05782         while (track) {
05783             if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
05784                 marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
05785                 marker->flag = tdt->flag;
05786 
05787                 tdt++;
05788 
05789                 if (track->flag & SELECT)
05790                     tdt++;
05791 
05792                 if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
05793                     tdt += 2;
05794 
05795                 if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
05796                     tdt += 2;
05797             }
05798 
05799             track = track->next;
05800         }
05801     }
05802     else if (tdt->mode == transDataTracking_ModeCurves) {
05803         MovieTrackingMarker *prev_marker;
05804 
05805         track = tracksbase->first;
05806         while (track) {
05807             if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
05808                 for (a = 1; a < track->markersnr; a++) {
05809                     marker = &track->markers[a];
05810                     prev_marker = &track->markers[a-1];
05811 
05812                     if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) || (prev_marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED))
05813                         continue;
05814 
05815                     if (marker->flag & (MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X|MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y)) {
05816                         marker->flag = tdt->flag;
05817                     }
05818                 }
05819             }
05820 
05821             track = track->next;
05822         }
05823     }
05824 }
05825 
05826 void flushTransTracking(TransInfo *t)
05827 {
05828     TransData *td;
05829     TransData2D *td2d;
05830     TransDataTracking *tdt;
05831     int a;
05832 
05833     if (t->state == TRANS_CANCEL)
05834         cancelTransTracking(t);
05835 
05836     /* flush to 2d vector from internally used 3d vector */
05837     for (a=0, td= t->data, td2d= t->data2d, tdt= t->customData; a<t->total; a++, td2d++, td++, tdt++) {
05838         if (tdt->mode == transDataTracking_ModeTracks) {
05839             if (t->flag & T_ALT_TRANSFORM) {
05840                 if (tdt->area == TRACK_AREA_POINT && tdt->relative) {
05841                     float d[2], d2[2];
05842 
05843                     if (!tdt->smarkers) {
05844                         tdt->smarkers = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*tdt->smarkers)*tdt->markersnr, "flushTransTracking markers");
05845                         for (a = 0; a < tdt->markersnr; a++)
05846                             copy_v2_v2(tdt->smarkers[a], tdt->markers[a].pos);
05847                     }
05848 
05849                     sub_v2_v2v2(d, td2d->loc, tdt->soffset);
05850                     sub_v2_v2(d, tdt->srelative);
05851 
05852                     sub_v2_v2v2(d2, td2d->loc, tdt->srelative);
05853 
05854                     for (a= 0; a<tdt->markersnr; a++)
05855                         add_v2_v2v2(tdt->markers[a].pos, tdt->smarkers[a], d2);
05856 
05857                     negate_v2_v2(td2d->loc2d, d);
05858                 }
05859             }
05860 
05861             if (tdt->area!=TRACK_AREA_POINT || tdt->relative==0) {
05862                 td2d->loc2d[0] = td2d->loc[0];
05863                 td2d->loc2d[1] = td2d->loc[1];
05864 
05865                 if (tdt->relative)
05866                     sub_v2_v2(td2d->loc2d, tdt->relative);
05867             }
05868         }
05869         else if (tdt->mode == transDataTracking_ModeCurves) {
05870             td2d->loc2d[tdt->coord] = tdt->prev_pos[tdt->coord] + td2d->loc[1] * tdt->scale;
05871         }
05872     }
05873 }
05874 
05875 void createTransData(bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
05876 {
05877     Scene *scene = t->scene;
05878     Object *ob = OBACT;
05879 
05880     if (t->options & CTX_TEXTURE) {
05881         t->flag |= T_TEXTURE;
05882         createTransTexspace(t);
05883     }
05884     else if (t->options & CTX_EDGE) {
05885         t->ext = NULL;
05886         t->flag |= T_EDIT;
05887         createTransEdge(t);
05888         if (t->data && t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) {
05889             sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05890             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
05891             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05892         }
05893     }
05894     else if (t->options == CTX_BMESH) {
05895         // TRANSFORM_FIX_ME
05896         //createTransBMeshVerts(t, G.editBMesh->bm, G.editBMesh->td);
05897     }
05898     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_IMAGE) {
05899         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05900         createTransUVs(C, t);
05901         if (t->data && (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT)) {
05902             sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05903             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
05904             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05905         }
05906     }
05907     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
05908         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05909         createTransActionData(C, t);
05910     }
05911     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_NLA) {
05912         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05913         createTransNlaData(C, t);
05914     }
05915     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_SEQ) {
05916         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05917         t->num.flag |= NUM_NO_FRACTION; /* sequencer has no use for floating point transformations */
05918         createTransSeqData(C, t);
05919     }
05920     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) {
05921         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05922         createTransGraphEditData(C, t);
05923 #if 0
05924         if (t->data && (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT)) {
05925             sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05926             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
05927             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05928         }
05929 #endif
05930     }
05931     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_NODE) {
05932         t->flag |= T_2D_EDIT|T_POINTS;
05933         createTransNodeData(C, t);
05934         if (t->data && (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT)) {
05935             sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05936             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
05937             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05938         }
05939     }
05940     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_CLIP) {
05941         t->flag |= T_POINTS|T_2D_EDIT;
05942         createTransTrackingData(C, t);
05943     }
05944     else if (t->obedit) {
05945         t->ext = NULL;
05946         if (t->obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
05947             createTransEditVerts(C, t);
05948         }
05949         else if (ELEM(t->obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
05950             createTransCurveVerts(C, t);
05951         }
05952         else if (t->obedit->type==OB_LATTICE) {
05953             createTransLatticeVerts(t);
05954         }
05955         else if (t->obedit->type==OB_MBALL) {
05956             createTransMBallVerts(t);
05957         }
05958         else if (t->obedit->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
05959             t->flag &= ~T_PROP_EDIT;
05960             createTransArmatureVerts(t);
05961         }
05962         else {
05963             printf("edit type not implemented!\n");
05964         }
05965 
05966         t->flag |= T_EDIT|T_POINTS;
05967 
05968         if (t->data && t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) {
05969             if (ELEM(t->obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_MESH)) {
05970                 sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05971                 set_prop_dist(t, 0);
05972                 sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05973             }
05974             else {
05975                 sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
05976                 set_prop_dist(t, 1);
05977                 sort_trans_data_dist(t);
05978             }
05979         }
05980 
05981         /* exception... hackish, we want bonesize to use bone orientation matrix (ton) */
05982         if (t->mode==TFM_BONESIZE) {
05983             t->flag &= ~(T_EDIT|T_POINTS);
05984             t->flag |= T_POSE;
05985             t->poseobj = ob;    /* <- tsk tsk, this is going to give issues one day */
05986         }
05987     }
05988     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
05989         // XXX this is currently limited to active armature only...
05990         // XXX active-layer checking isn't done as that should probably be checked through context instead
05991         createTransPose(t, ob);
05992     }
05993     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
05994         /* important that ob_armature can be set even when its not selected [#23412]
05995          * lines below just check is also visible */
05996         Object *ob_armature= modifiers_isDeformedByArmature(ob);
05997         if (ob_armature && ob_armature->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
05998             Base *base_arm= object_in_scene(ob_armature, t->scene);
05999             if (base_arm) {
06000                 View3D *v3d = t->view;
06001                 if (BASE_VISIBLE(v3d, base_arm)) {
06002                     createTransPose(t, ob_armature);
06003                 }
06004             }
06005             
06006         }
06007     }
06008     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) && PE_start_edit(PE_get_current(scene, ob))) {
06009         createTransParticleVerts(C, t);
06010         t->flag |= T_POINTS;
06011 
06012         if (t->data && t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) {
06013             sort_trans_data(t); // makes selected become first in array
06014             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
06015             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
06016         }
06017     }
06018     else if (ob && (ob->mode & (OB_MODE_SCULPT|OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT))) {
06019         /* sculpt mode and project paint have own undo stack
06020          * transform ops redo clears sculpt/project undo stack.
06021          *
06022          * Could use 'OB_MODE_ALL_PAINT' since there are key conflicts,
06023          * transform + paint isn't well supported. */
06024     }
06025     else {
06026         createTransObject(C, t);
06027         t->flag |= T_OBJECT;
06028 
06029         if (t->data && t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) {
06030             // selected objects are already first, no need to presort
06031             set_prop_dist(t, 1);
06032             sort_trans_data_dist(t);
06033         }
06034 
06035         if ((t->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) && (t->ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW))
06036         {
06037             View3D *v3d = t->view;
06038             RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
06039             if (rv3d && (t->flag & T_OBJECT) && v3d->camera == OBACT && rv3d->persp==RV3D_CAMOB)
06040             {
06041                 t->flag |= T_CAMERA;
06042             }
06043         }
06044     }
06045 
06046 // TRANSFORM_FIX_ME
06047 //  /* temporal...? */
06048 //  t->scene->recalc |= SCE_PRV_CHANGED;    /* test for 3d preview */
06049 }
